original: jñānaṃ jñeyakramātsiddhaṃ kramavatsarvamanyathā | yaugapadyena tatkāryaṃ vijñānamanuṣajyate || jñānamātre'pi naivāsya śakrakya rūpaṃ tataḥ param | bhavatīti prasaktā'sya vandhyāsūnusamānatā ||

original: prāṇādīnāṃ ca sambandho yadi siddhaḥ sahātmanā | bhavettadā prasaṅgo'yaṃ yujyate 'saṅgato'nyathā || na vandhyāsutaśūnyatve jīvaddehaḥ prasajyate | prāṇādivirahe hyevaṃ tavāpyetatprasañjanam ||
analyzed: prāṇa ādīnām ca sambandhaḥ yadi siddhaḥ saha ātmanā bhavet tadā prasaṅgaḥ yam yujyate saṅgataḥ anyathā  na vandhyā suta śūnya tve jīvat dehaḥ prasajyate prāṇa ādi virahe hi evam tava api etat prasañjanam

original: evaṃ ca sādhanaiḥ sarvairātmasatvāprasiddhitaḥ | nityavyāpitvayoruktaṃ sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam ||
analyzed: evam ca sādhanaiḥ sarvaiḥ ātma satva aprasiddhitaḥ nitya vyāpi tvayoḥ uktam sādhya hīnam nidarśanam

original: anyaiḥ pratyakṣasiddhatvamātmanaḥ parikalpitam | svasaṃvedyo hyahaṅkārastasyātmā viṣayo mataḥ ||
analyzed: anyaiḥ pratyakṣa siddha tvam ātmanaḥ parikalpitam sva saṃvedyaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ tasya ātmā viṣayaḥ mataḥ

original: tadayuktamahaṅkāre tadrūpānavabhāsanāt | na hi nityavibhutvādinirbhāsastatra lakṣyate || gauravarṇādinirbhāso vyaktaṃ tatra tu vidyate | tatsvabhāvo na cā''tmeṣṭo nāyaṃ tadviṣayastataḥ ||
analyzed: tat ayuktam ahaṅkāre tad rūpa anavabhāsanāt na hi nitya vibhu tva ādi nirbhāsaḥ tatra lakṣyate  gaura varṇa ādi nirbhāsaḥ vyaktam tatra tu vidyate tad svabhāvaḥ na ca ātma iṣṭaḥ na ayam tad viṣayaḥ tatas

original: yadi pratyakṣagamyaśca satyataḥ puruṣo bhavet | tatkimarthaṃ vivādo'yaṃ tatsattvādau pravarttate ||
analyzed: yadi pratyakṣa gamyaḥ ca satyataḥ puruṣaḥ bhavet tat kimartham vivādaḥ iyam tad sattva ādau pravarttate

original: tathā hi niścayātmā'yamahaṅkāraḥ pravarttate | niścayāropabuddhyośca bādhyabādhakatā sthitā ||
analyzed: tathā hi niścaya ātmā ayam ahaṅkāraḥ pravarttate niścaya āropa buddhyoḥ ca bādhya bādhaka tā sthitā

original: tasmādicchādayaḥ sarve naivātmasamavāyinaḥ | krameṇotpadyamānatvādbījāṅkuralatādivat || atha vā''dhyātmikāḥ sarve nairātmyākrāntamūrttayaḥ | vastusattvādihetubhyo yathā bāhyā ghaṭādayaḥ ||
analyzed: tasmāt icchā ādayaḥ sarve na eva ātma samavāyinaḥ krameṇa utpadyamāna tvāt bīja aṅkura latā ādi vat  atha vā ādhyātmikāḥ sarve nairātmya ākrānta mūrttayaḥ vastu sattva ādi hetubhyaḥ yathā bāhyāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ

original: sātmakatve hi nityatvaṃ taddhetūnāṃ prasajyate | nityāścārthakriyā'śaktā nātaḥ sattvādisambhavaḥ ||
analyzed: sātmaka tve hi nitya tvam tad hetūnām prasajyate nityāḥ ca artha kriyā śaktāḥ na atas sattva ādi sambhavaḥ

original: ghaṭādiṣu samānaṃ ca yavairātmāyannairātmyaṃ niṣidhyate | parairjīvaccharīre'smiṃstadasmābhiḥ prasādhyate ||
analyzed: ghaṭa ādiṣu samānam ca paraiḥ jīvat śarīre smin tat asmābhiḥ prasādhyate

original: itthamātmāprasiddhau ca prakriyā tatra yā kṛtā | nirāspadaiva sā sarvā vandhyāputra iva sthitā ||
analyzed: ittham ātma aprasiddhau ca prakriyā tatra yā kṛtā nirāspadā eva sā sarvā vandhyā putraḥ iva sthitā

original: vyāvṛttyanugamātmānamātmānamapare punaḥ | caitanyarūpamicchanti caitanyaṃ buddhilakṣaṇam ||
analyzed: vyāvṛtti anugama ātmānam ātmānam apare punar caitanya rūpam icchanti caitanyam buddhi lakṣaṇam

original: yathā'heḥ kuṇḍalāvasthā vyapaiti tadanantaram | saṃbhavatyārjavāvasthā sarpatvaṃ tvanuvarttate || tathaiva nityacaitanyasvabhāvasyātmano'pi na | niḥśeṣarūpavigamaḥ sarvasyānugamo'pi vā || kintvasya vinivarttante sukhaduḥkhādilakṣaṇāḥ | avasthāstāśca jāyante caitanyaṃ tvanuvarttate ||
analyzed: yathā aheḥ kuṇḍala avasthā vyapaiti tad anantaram saṃbhavati ārjava avasthā sarpa tvam tu anuvarttate tathā eva nitya caitanya svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ api na niḥśeṣa rūpa vigamaḥ sarvasya anugamaḥ api vā kintu asya vinivarttante sukha duḥkha ādi lakṣaṇāḥ avasthāḥ tāḥ ca jāyante caitanyam tu anuvarttate

original: syātāṃ hyatyantanāśe'sya kṛtanāśākṛtāgamau | sukhaduḥkhādibhogaśca naiva syādekarūpiṇaḥ ||
analyzed: syātām hi atyanta nāśa isya kṛta nāśa akṛta āgamau sukha duḥkha ādi bhogaḥ ca nā eva syāt eka rūpiṇaḥ

original: na ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtve puṃso'vasthāṃ samāśrite | tato'vasthāvatastattvātkarttaivāpnoti tatphalam ||
analyzed: na ca kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tve samāśrite

original: pumānevaṃvidhaścāyaṃ pratyabhijñānabhāvataḥ | pramīyate prabādhā ca nairātmyasyāmunaiva hi ||
analyzed: pumān evaṃvidhaḥ ca ayam pratyabhijñāna bhāvataḥ pramīyate prabādhā ca nairātmyasya amunā eva hi

original: ahaṃ vedmītyahaṃbuddhirjñātāraṃ pratipadyate | sa cātmā yadi vā jñānaṃ syādekāntavinaśvaram || yadyātmā viṣayastasyāścaturasraṃ tadā'khilam | kṣaṇikajñānapakṣe tu sarvamevātidurghaṭam || tathā hi jñātavānpūrvamahameva ca samprati | ahameva pravedmīti yā buddhirupajāyate || tasyā jñānakṣaṇaḥ ko nu viṣayaḥ parikalpyate | atītaḥ sāmprataḥ kiṃ vā kiṃ vā'sāvatha santatiḥ || tatrā''dye viṣaye jñāte jñātavāniti yujyate | jānāmīti na yuktaṃ ca nedānīṃ vettyasau tataḥ || varttamāne tu viṣaye pravedmītyupapadyate | jñātavānityasatyaṃ tu naivāsītprāgidaṃ yataḥ || ata eva dvayaṃ grāhyaṃ naiva tasyāḥ prakalpyate | na hyubhau jñātavantau vā jānīto vā'dhunā punaḥ || santāno'pi na tadgrāhyo dvitayasyāpyasaṃbhavāt | na hyasau jñātavānpūrvamavastutvānna vā'dhunā || tasmādayamahaṅkāro varttate yatra gocare | uktādanyatra siddho'sāvātmā śāśvatarūpavān ||
analyzed: aham vedmi iti ahaṃbuddhiḥ jñātāram pratipadyate  sa ca ātmā yadi vā jñānam syāt ekānta vinaśvaram yadi ātmā viṣayaḥ tasyāḥ catur asram tadā akhilam kṣaṇika jñāna pakṣe tu sarvam eva ati durghaṭam tathā hi jñātavān pūrvam aham eva ca samprati aham eva pravedmi iti yā buddhiḥ upajāyate tasyāḥ jñāna kṣaṇaḥ kaḥ nu viṣayaḥ parikalpyate atītaḥ sāmprataḥ kim vā kim vā asau atha santatiḥ tatra ādye viṣaye jñāte jñātavān iti yujyate jā

original: vyatītāhaṅkṛtigrāhyo jñātā'dyāpyanuvarttate | ahampratyayagamyatvādidānīntanaboddhṛvat || eṣa vā hyastano jñātā jñātṛtvāttata eva vā | hyastanajñātṛvatteṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ ca sādhyatā ||
analyzed: vyatīta ahaṅkṛti grāhyaḥ jñātā adya api anuvarttate ahampratyaya gamya tvāt idānīntana boddhṛ vat  eṣa vā hyastanaḥ jñātā jñātṛ tvāt tatas eva vā hyastana jñātṛ vat teṣām pratyayānām ca sādhya tā

original: ekasantānasambandhajñātrahampratyayatvataḥ | hyastanādyatanāḥ sarve tulyārthā ekabuddhivat ||
analyzed: eka santāna sambandha jñātṛ ahampratyaya tvataḥ hyastana adyatanāḥ sarve tulya arthāḥ eka buddhi vat

original: tadatra cintyate nityamekaṃ caitanyamiṣyate | yadi buddhirapi prāptā tadrūpaiva tathā sati ||
analyzed: tat atra cintyate nityam ekam caitanyam iṣyate yadi buddhiḥ api prāptā tad rūpā eva tathā sati

original: buddhīnāmapi caitanyasvābhāvyātpuruṣasya ca | nityatvamekatāceṣṭā bhedaścedbiṣayāśrayaḥ ||
analyzed: buddhīnām api caitanya svābhāvyāt puruṣasya ca nitya tvam ekatā ceṣṭā bhedaḥ ced viṣaya āśrayaḥ

original: svarūpeṇa tathā vahnirnityaṃ dahanadharmakaḥ | upanītaṃ dahatyarthaṃ dāhyaṃ nānyanna cānyadā ||
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa tathā vahniḥ nityam dahana dharmakaḥ  upanītam dahati artham dāhyam na anyat na ca anyadā

original: yathā vā darpaṇaḥ svaccho yathā vā sphaṭikopalaḥ | yadevā''dhīyate tatra tacchāyāṃ pratipadyate || tathaiva nityacaitanyāḥ pumāṃso dehavṛttayaḥ | gṛhṇanti karaṇānītān rūpādīndhīrasau ca naḥ ||
analyzed: yathā vā darpaṇaḥ su acchaḥ yathā vā sphaṭika upalaḥ yat eva ādhīyate tatra tad chāyām pratipadyate tathā eva nitya caitanyāḥ pumāṃsaḥ deha vṛttayaḥ gṛhṇanti karaṇa ānītān rūpa ādīn dhīḥ asau ca naḥ

original: tenopanetṛsaṃrambhabhaṅgitvādbhaṅginī matiḥ | na nityaṃ dāhako vahnirdāhyāsannidhinā yathā ||
analyzed: tena upanetṛ saṃrambha bhaṅgi tvāt bhaṅginī matiḥ na nityam dāhakaḥ vahniḥ dāhya asannidhinā yathā

original: tatra bodhātmakatvena pratyabhijñāyate matiḥ | ghaṭahastyādibuddhitvaṃ tadbhedāllokasaṃmatam ||
analyzed: tatra bodha ātmaka tvena pratyabhijñāyate matiḥ ghaṭa hasti ādi buddhi tvam tad bhedāt loka saṃmatam

original: saiveti nocyate buddhirarthabhedānusāribhiḥ | na cāstyapratyabhijñānamarthabhede'nupāśrite ||
analyzed: sā eva iti nā ucyate buddhiḥ artha bheda anusāribhiḥ na ca asti apratyabhijñānam artha bhedena upāśrite

original: nanu hastyādiśūnyāyāṃ bhūmāvāropakāriṇaḥ | pratyayā ye pravarttante bhedastatra kimāśrayaḥ ||
analyzed: nanu hasti ādi śūnyāyām bhūmau āropakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ ye pravarttante bhedaḥ tatra kimāśrayaḥ

original: anyadeśādibhāvinyo vyaktayaścennibandhanam | sarvatrālambanaṃ yasmāddeśakālānyathātmakam ||
analyzed: anya deśa ādi bhāvinyaḥ vyaktayaḥ ced nibandhanam sarvatra ālambanam yasmāt deśa kāla anyathā ātmakam

original: nanu taddeśasambandho naiva tāsāṃ tathā'sti tat | kimiti pratibhāsante tena rūpeṇa tatra ca ||
analyzed: nanu tad deśa sambandhaḥ nā eva tāsām tathā asti tat kim iti pratibhāsante tena rūpeṇa tatra ca

original: bhavanmate hi nākāro buddherbāhyastu varṇyate | na vivakṣitadeśe ca gajayaṣṭyādayaḥ sthitāḥ ||
analyzed: bhavat mate hi na ākāraḥ buddheḥ bāhyaḥ tu varṇyate na vivakṣita deśe ca gaja yaṣṭi ādayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: sarvārthabodharūpā ca yadi buddhiḥ sadā sthitā | sarvadā sarvasaṃvittistatkimarthaṃ na vidyate ||
analyzed: sarva artha bodha rūpā ca yadi buddhiḥ sadā sthitā sarvadā sarva saṃvittiḥ tat kimartham na vidyate

original: śabdopadhānā yā buddhī rasarūpādigocarā | saiva hīti na cedbhedāstvayā caivopapāditāḥ ||
analyzed: śabda upadhānā yā buddhī rasa rūpa ādi gocarā sā eva hi iti na ced bhedāḥ tvayā ca eva upapāditāḥ

original: samastadāhyarūpāṇāṃ na nityaṃ dahanātmakaḥ | kṛśānurapi niḥśeṣamanyathā bhasmasādbhavet ||
analyzed: samasta dāhya rūpāṇām na nityam dahana ātmakaḥ kṛśānuḥ api niḥśeṣam anyathā bhasmasāt bhavet

original: dāhyārthasannidhāveva tasya taddāhakātmatā | yuktā sarvārthadāho hi sakṛdevaṃ na sajyate ||
analyzed: dāhya artha sannidhau eva tasya tad dāhaka ātma tā yuktā sarva artha dāhaḥ hi sakṛt evam na sajyate

original: nīlotpalādisambandhāddarpaṇasphaṭikādayaḥ | tacchāyāvibhramotpādahetavaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ || sopadhānetarāvastha eka eveti sarvadā | tacchāyastadviyukto vā sa dṛśyetānyathā punaḥ ||
analyzed: nīlotpala ādi sambandhāt darpaṇa sphaṭika ādayaḥ tad chāyā vibhrama utpāda hetavaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ sopadhāna itara avasthaḥ ekaḥ evā iti sarvadā  tad chāyaḥ tad viyuktaḥ vā sa dṛśyeta anyathā punar

original: sthiratvānnirvibhāgatvānmūrttānāmasahasthiteḥ | bibhartti darpaṇatalaṃ naiva cchāyāṃ kadācana ||
analyzed: sthira tvāt nirvibhāga tvāt mūrttānām a saha sthiteḥ bibhartti darpaṇa talam nā eva chāyām kadācana

original: pārśvadvitayasaṃsthāśca suśuklaṃ sphaṭikopalam | samīkṣyante tadeṣo'pi na cchāyāṃ pratipannavān ||
analyzed: pārśva dvitaya saṃsthāḥ ca su śuklam sphaṭika upalam samīkṣyante tat eṣaḥ api na chāyām pratipannavān

original: bhedaḥ pratyupadhānaṃ ca sphaṭikādeḥ prasajyate | tacchāyāpratipattiścettasya vidyeta tātvikī ||
analyzed: bhedaḥ pratyupadhānam ca sphaṭika ādeḥ prasajyate tad chāyā pratipattiḥ ced tasya vidyeta tātvikī

original: tasmādbhrāntiriyaṃ teṣu vicitrācintyaśaktiṣu |
analyzed: tasmāt bhrāntiḥ iyam teṣu vicitra acintya śaktiṣu

original: na buddhau bhrāntibhāvo'pi yukto bhedaviyogataḥ ||
analyzed: na buddhau bhrānti bhāvaḥ api yuktaḥ bheda viyogataḥ

original: abodharūpabhedaṃ tu samānaṃ sarvabuddhiṣu | āropya pratyabhijñānaṃ nānātve'pi pravarttate ||
analyzed: a bodha rūpa bhedam tu samānam sarva buddhiṣu āropya pratyabhijñānam nānātve pi pravarttate

original: avasthābhedabhedena śūnye'pyekāntataḥ sthite | sthirātmani  ryatparaiḥ parikalpyate || sukhaduḥkhādyavasthāśca gacchannapi naro mama | caitanyadravyasattvādirūpaṃ naiva vimuñcati ||
analyzed: avasthā bheda bhedena śūnye api ekāntataḥ sthite sthira ātmani    parikalpyate sukha duḥkha ādi avasthāḥ ca gacchan api naraḥ mama caitanya dravya sattva ādi rūpam na eva vimuñcati

original: na cāvasthāntarotpāde pūrvā'tyantaṃ vinaśyati | uttarānuguṇārthaṃ tu sāmānyātmani līyate ||
analyzed: na ca avasthā antara utpāde pūrva atyantam vinaśyati uttara anuguṇa artham tu sāmānya ātmani līyate

original: svarūpeṇa hyavasthānāmanyonyasya virodhitā | aviruddhastu sarvāsu sāmānyātmā pratīyate ||
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa hi avasthānām anyonyasya virodhi tā  aviruddhaḥ tu sarvāsu sāmānya ātmā pratīyate

original: tatra no cedavasthānāmekāntena vibhinnatā | puruṣāttadvyayotpāde syātāmasyāpi tau tathā ||
analyzed: tatra no ced avasthānām ekāntena vibhinna tā puruṣāt tad vyaya utpāde syātām asya api tau tathā

original: viruddhadharmasaṅge tu bheda ekāntiko bhavet | puṃsāmiva svabhāvena pratisvaṃ niyatena te ||
analyzed: viruddha dharma saṅge tu bhedaḥ ekāntikaḥ bhavet puṃsām iva svabhāvena pratisvam niyatena te

original: svarūpeṇaiva līyante yadyavasthāśca puṃsi vaḥ | duḥkhādyapyanubhūyeta tatsukhādisamudbhave ||
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa eva līyante yadi avasthāḥ ca puṃsi vaḥ  duḥkha ādi api anubhūyeta tad sukha ādi samudbhave

original: na cānyarūpasaṅkrāntāvanyasaṅkrānti sambhavaḥ  | tādātmyena ca saṅkrāntirityātmodayavānbhavet ||
analyzed: na ca anya rūpa saṅkrāntau anya saṅkrānti sambhavaḥ tādātmyena ca saṅkrāntiḥ iti ātma udayavān bhavet

original: yadi kartṛtvabhoktṛtve naivāvasthāṃ samāśrite | tadavasthāvatastatvānna kartṛtvādisaṃbhavaḥ ||
analyzed: yadi kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tve nā eva avasthām samāśrite tad avasthāvataḥ ta tvāt na kartṛ tva ādi saṃbhavaḥ

original: tannityaśabdavācyatvaṃ nātmano vinivāryate | svarūpavikriyāvattvādvyucchedastasya vidyate ||
analyzed: tat nitya śabda vācya tvam na ātmanaḥ vinivāryate sva rūpa vikriyāvat tvāt vyucchedaḥ tasya vidyate

original: sarpo'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgitvātkauṭilyādīnprapadyate | sthirarūpe tu puṃsīva nāvasthāntarasaṅgatiḥ ||
analyzed: sarpaḥ api kṣaṇabhaṅgi tvāt kauṭilya ādīn prapadyate sthira rūpe tu puṃsi iva na avasthā antara saṅgatiḥ

original: nirālambana evāyamahaṅkāraḥ pravarttate | anādisattvadṛgbījaprabhāvātkvacideva hi ||
analyzed: nirālambanaḥ eva ayam ahaṅkāraḥ pravarttate anādi sattva dṛś bīja prabhāvāt kvacid eva hi

original: kecideva hi saṃskārāstadrūpādhyavasāyini | avetyaṃ ādhipatyaṃ prapadyante tanna sarvatra varttate ||
analyzed: kecid eva hi saṃskārāḥ tad rūpa adhyavasāyini avetyam ādhipatyam prapadyante tat na sarvatra varttate

original: tulyaḥ paryanuyogo'yamanyathā puruṣe'pi vaḥ | tacchaktibhedasadbhāvātsarvameva nirākulam ||
analyzed: tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ yam anyathā puruṣe pi vaḥ tad śakti bheda sadbhāvāt sarvam eva nirākulam

original: nityālambanapakṣe tu sarvāhaṅkṛtayastataḥ | sakṛdeva prasūyeran śaktahetuvyavasthiteḥ || anityālambanatve'pi spaṣṭābhāḥ syustataḥ pare | ālambanārthasadbhāvaṃ vyarthaṃ paryanuyuñjate ||
analyzed: nitya ālambana pakṣe tu sarva ahaṅkṛtayaḥ tatas sakṛt eva prasūyeran śakta hetu vyavasthiteḥ anitya ālambana tve pi spaṣṭa ābhāḥ syuḥ tatas pare ālambana artha sadbhāvam vyartham paryanuyuñjate

original: jñātari pratyabhijñānaṃ vāsanā kartumarhati | nātasminsa iti prajñāṃ na hyasau bhrāntikāraṇam || tannāhaṃpratyayo bhrāntiriṣṭaścedbādhavarjanāt | nānantaroktayā yuktyā tasya bādhopadarśanāt ||
analyzed: jñātari pratyabhijñānam vāsanā kartum arhati na a tasmin saḥ iti prajñām na hi asau bhrānti kāraṇam tat na ahaṃpratyayaḥ bhrāntiḥ iṣṭaḥ ced bādha varjanāt na anantara uktayā yuktyā tasya bādha upadarśanāt

original: īśvarādiṣu bhaktānāṃ taddhetutvādivibhramāḥ | vāsanāmātrabhāvācca jāyante vividhāḥ katham ||
analyzed: īśvara ādiṣu bhaktānām tad hetu tva ādi vibhramāḥ vāsanā mātra bhāvāt ca jāyante vividhāḥ katham

original: nirālambanatā caivamahaṅkāre yadā sthitā | tannāhaṃpratyayagrāhye jñātā kaścana vidyate || tataḥ sarvapramāṇeṣu na dṛṣṭānto'sti siddhibhāk | hetavaścāśrayāsiddhā yathāyogamudāhṛtāḥ ||

analyzed: athavā asthāne eva ayam āyāsaḥ kriyate yatas kṣaṇa bhaṅga prasiddhyā eva prakṛti ādi nirākṛtam uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya jāti ādeḥ ca aviśeṣataḥ niṣedhāya tatas spaṣṭam kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ prasādhyate

original: athavā'sthāna evāyamāyāsaḥ kriyate yataḥ | kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasiddhyaiva prakṛtyādi nirākṛtam || uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya jātyādeścāviśeṣataḥ | niṣedhāya tataḥ spaṣṭaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasādhyate ||
analyzed: athavā asthāne eva ayam āyāsaḥ kriyate yatas kṣaṇa bhaṅga prasiddhyā eva prakṛti ādi nirākṛtam uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya jāti ādeḥ ca aviśeṣataḥ niṣedhāya tatas spaṣṭam kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ prasādhyate

original: kṛtakākṛtakatvena dvairāśyaṃ kaiścidiṣyate | kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvena bhāvānāmaparairmatam ||
analyzed: kṛtaka akṛtaka tvena dvairāśyam kaiścid iṣyate kṣaṇika akṣaṇika tvena bhāvānām aparaiḥ matam

original: tatra ye kṛtakā bhāvāste sarve kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ | vināśaṃ prati sarveṣāmanapekṣatayā sthiteḥ ||
analyzed: tatra ye kṛtakāḥ bhāvāḥ te sarve kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ vināśam prati sarveṣām anapekṣa tayā sthiteḥ

original: yadbhāvaṃ prati yannaiva hetvantaramapekṣate | tattatra niyataṃ jñeyaṃ svahetubhyastathodayāt || nirnibandhā hi sāmagrī svakāryotpādane yathā | vināśaṃ prati sarve'pi nirapekṣāśca janminaḥ ||
analyzed: yat bhāvam prati yat na eva hetu antaram apekṣate tat tatra niyatam jñeyam sva hetubhyaḥ tathā udayāt  nirnibandhā hi sāmagrī sva kārya utpādane yathā  vināśam prati sarve api nirapekṣāḥ ca janminaḥ

original: anapekṣo'pi yadyeṣa deśakālāntare bhavet | tadapekṣatayā naiṣa nirapekṣaḥ prasajyate ||
analyzed: anapekṣaḥ upi yadi eṣa deśa kāla antare bhavet tad apekṣa tayā na eṣa nirapekṣaḥ prasajyate

original: sarvatraivānapekṣāśca vināśe janmino'khilāḥ | sarvathā nāśahetūnāṃ tatrākiñcitkaratvataḥ ||
analyzed: sarvatra eva anapekṣāḥ ca vināśe janminā ukhilāḥ sarvathā nāśa hetūnām tatra akiñcitkara tvataḥ

original: tathāhi nāśako heturna bhāvāvyatirekiṇaḥ | nāśasya kārako yuktaḥ svahetorbhāvajanmataḥ ||
analyzed: tathā hi nāśakaḥ hetuḥ na bhāva avyatirekiṇaḥ nāśasya kārakaḥ yuktaḥ sva hetoḥ bhāva janmataḥ

original: na cānaṃśe samudbhūte bhāvātmanyātmahetutaḥ | tadātmaiva vināśo'nyairādhātuṃ pāryate punaḥ ||
analyzed: na ca an aṃśe samudbhūte bhāva ātmani ātma hetutaḥ tad ātmā eva vināśaḥ nyaiḥ ādhātum pāryate punar

original: padārthavyatirikte tu nāśanāmni kṛte sati | bhāve hetvantaraistasya na kiñcidupajāyate || tenopalambhakāryādi prāgvadevānuṣajyate | tādavasthyācca naivāsya yuktamāvaraṇādyapi ||
analyzed: padārtha vyatirikte tu nāśa nāmni kṛte sati bhāve hetu antaraiḥ tasya na kiñcid upajāyate tena upalambha kārya ādi prāgvat eva anuṣajyate tādavasthyāt ca nā eva asya yuktam āvaraṇa ādi api

original: nāśanāmnā padārthena bhāvo nāśyata ityasat | anyatvādivikalpānāṃ tatrāpyarthānuvṛttitaḥ ||
analyzed: nāśa nāmnā padārthena bhāvaḥ nāśyate iti asat anya tva ādi vikalpānām tatra api artha anuvṛttitaḥ

original: bhāvābhāvātmako nāśaḥ pradhvaṃsāparasaṃjñakaḥ | kriyate cenna tasyāpi karaṇaṃ yuktisaṃgatam || abhāvasya ca kāryatve vastutaivāṅkurādivat | prasaktājanyarūpasya hetuśaktyā samudbhavāt ||
analyzed: bhāva abhāva ātmakaḥ nāśaḥ pradhvaṃsa apara saṃjñakaḥ kriyate ced na tasya api karaṇam yukti saṃgatam  abhāvasya ca kārya tve vastu tā eva aṅkura ādi vat prasakta ajanya rūpasya hetu śaktyā samudbhavāt

original: vidhinaivamabhāvaśca paryudāsāśrayātkṛtaḥ | yastatra vyatirekādivikalpo varttate punaḥ ||
analyzed: vidhinā evam abhāvaḥ ca paryudāsa āśrayāt kṛtaḥ yaḥ tatra vyatireka ādi vikalpaḥ varttate punar

original: atha kriyāniṣedho'yaṃ bhāvaṃ naiva karoti hi | tathāpyahetutā siddhā karturhetutvahānitaḥ ||
analyzed: atha kriyā niṣedhaḥ yam bhāvam nā eva karoti hi tathā api ahetutā siddhā kartuḥ hetu tva hānitaḥ

original: nanu naiva vināśo'yaṃ sattākāle'sti vastunaḥ | na pūrvaṃ na cirātpaścādvastuno'nantaraṃ tvasau || evaṃ ca hetumāneṣa yukto niyatakālataḥ | kādācitkatvayogo hi nirapekṣe nirākṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: nanu nā eva vināśaḥ yam sattā kālā īsti vastunaḥ  na pūrvam na cirāt paścāt vastunaḥ ūnantaram tu asau  evam ca hetumān eṣa yuktaḥ niyata kālataḥ kādācitkatva yogaḥ hi nirapekṣe nirākṛtaḥ

original: vastvanantarabhāvācca hetumāneva yujyate | abhūtvābhāvataścāpi yathaivānyaḥ kṣaṇo mataḥ ||
analyzed: vastu anantara bhāvāt ca hetumān eva yujyate a bhūtvā abhāvataḥ ca api yathā eva anyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ mataḥ

original: ahetukatvātkiṃcāyamasanvandhyāsutādivat | athavā''kāśavannityo na prakārāntaraṃ yataḥ || asattve sarvabhāvānāṃ nityatvaṃ syādanāśataḥ | sarvasaṃskāranāśitvapratyayaścānimittakaḥ || nityatve'pi saha sthānaṃ vināśenāvirodhataḥ | ajātasya ca nāśoktirnaiva yuktyanupātinī ||
analyzed: ahetuka tvāt kiṃca ayam asan vandhyā suta ādi vat  athavā ākāśa vat nityaḥ na prakāra antaram yatas asattve sarva bhāvānām nitya tvam syāt anāśataḥ sarva saṃskāra nāśi tva pratyayaḥ ca animittakaḥ nitya tve api saha sthānam vināśena avirodhataḥ  ajātasya ca nāśa uktiḥ nā eva yukti anupātinī

original: tadatra katamaṃ nāśaṃ pare paryanuyuñjate | kiṃ kṣaṇasthitidharmāṇaṃ bhāvameva tathoditam || atha bhāvasvarūpasya nivṛttiṃ dhvaṃsasaṃjñitām | pūrvaparyunuyoge hi naiva kiñcidvirudhyate ||
analyzed: tat atra katamam nāśam pare paryanuyuñjate  kim kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāṇam bhāvam eva tathā uditam atha bhāva svarūpasya nivṛttim dhvaṃsa saṃjñitām  pūrva paryunuyoge hi nā eva kiñcid virudhyate

original: yo hi bhāvaḥ kṣaṇasthāyī vināśa iti gīyate | taṃ hetumantamicchāmaḥ parābhāvāttvahetukam ||
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ kṣaṇa sthāyī vināśaḥ iti gīyate tam hetumantam icchāmaḥ parābhāvāt tu ahetukam

original: vastvanantarabhāvitvaṃ na tatra tvasti tādṛśi | calabhāvasvarūpasya bhāvenaiva sahodayāt ||
analyzed: vastu anantara bhāvi tvam na tatra tu asti tādṛśi cala bhāva svarūpasya bhāvena eva saha udayāt

original: ato vināśasadbhāvānna nityāḥ sarvasaṃskṛtāḥ | na vināśītibuddhiśca nirnimittā prasajyate ||
analyzed: atas vināśa sadbhāvāt na nityāḥ sarva saṃskṛtāḥ na vināśīti buddhiḥ ca nirnimittā prasajyate

original: pradhvaṃsasya tu nairātmyānnāstyanantarabhāvitā | nābhūtvābhāvayogasya gaganendīvarādivat ||
analyzed: pradhvaṃsasya tu nairātmyāt na asti anantara bhāvi tā  na a bhūtvā abhāva yogasya gagana indīvara ādi vat

original: pradhvaṃso bhavatītyeva na bhāvo bhavatītyayam | arthaḥ pratyāyyate tvatra na vidhiḥ kasyacinmataḥ ||
analyzed: pradhvaṃsaḥ bhavati iti eva na bhāvaḥ bhavati iti ayam arthaḥ pratyāyyate tu atra na vidhiḥ kasyacid mataḥ

original: na hi bāleya ityevannāmamātre kṛte kvacit | sarvo rāsabhadharmo'sminprasaktiṃ labhate nare ||
analyzed: na hi bāleyaḥ iti evat nāma mātre kṛte kvacid sarvaḥ rāsabha dharmaḥ smin prasaktim labhate nare

original: dhvaṃsanāmnaḥ padārthasya vidhāne punarasya na | vastuno jāyate kiñcidityetatkiṃ nivarttate ||
analyzed: dhvaṃsa nāmnaḥ padārthasya vidhāne punar asya na vastunaḥ jāyate kiñcid iti etat kim nivarttate

original: bhāvadhvaṃsātmanaścaivaṃ nāśasyāsattvamiṣyate | vasturūpaviyogena na bhāvābhāvarūpataḥ ||
analyzed: bhāva dhvaṃsa ātmanaḥ ca evam nāśasya asattvam iṣyate vastu rūpa viyogena na bhāva abhāva rūpataḥ

original: nivṛttirūpatā'pyasminvidhinā nābhidhīyate | vasturūpānuvṛttiśca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ niṣidhyate || ato vyavasthitaṃ rūpaṃ vihitaṃ nāsya kiṃcana | iti nityavikalpo'sminkriyamāṇo nirāspadaḥ ||
analyzed: nivṛtti rūpa tā api asmin vidhinā nā abhidhīyate vastu rūpa anuvṛttiḥ ca kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam niṣidhyate  atas vyavasthitam rūpam vihitam na asya kiṃcana iti nitya vikalpaḥ asmin kriyamāṇaḥ nirāspadaḥ

original: ye tu vyomādayo bhāvā akṛtatvena saṃmatāḥ | vastuvṛttyā na santyeva te ca śaktiviyogataḥ || kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādivikalpasteṣvanāspadaḥ | tadā vastveva yena syātkṣaṇikaṃ yadivānyathā ||
analyzed: ye tu vyoma ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ akṛta tvena saṃmatāḥ vastu vṛttyā na santi eva te ca śakti viyogataḥ kṣaṇika akṣaṇika tva ādi vikalpaḥ teṣu anāspadaḥ tadā vastu eva yena syāt kṣaṇikam yat iva anyathā

original: kṣaṇāvasthitarūpaṃ hi vastu kṣaṇikamucyate | sthirarūpasamākrāntaṃ vastvevākṣaṇikaṃ punaḥ ||
analyzed: kṣaṇa avasthita rūpam hi vastu kṣaṇikam ucyate sthira rūpa samākrāntam vastu eva akṣaṇikam punar

original: utpādānantarāsthāyi svarūpaṃ yacca vastunaḥ | taducyateḥ kṣaṇaḥ so'sti yasya tatkṣaṇikaṃ matam ||
analyzed: utpāda anantara a sthāyi svarūpam yat ca vastunaḥ tat ucyateḥ kṣaṇaḥ saḥ usti yasya tat kṣaṇikam matam

original: asatyapyarthabhede ca so'styasyeti na bādhyate | icchāracitasaṅketamātrabhāvi hi vācakam ||
analyzed: asati api artha bhede ca saḥ asti asya iti na bādhyate icchā racita saṅketa mātra bhāvi hi vācakam

original: udayānantarāsthāyi vastvevaṃ tu vivakṣitam | tatra sapratyayaḥ śabdo'pratyayo vā prayujyatām ||
analyzed: udaya anantara ā sthāyi vastu evam tu vivakṣitam tatra sa pratyayaḥ vā prayujyatām

original: yadi tu vyomakālādyāḥ santaḥ syuste tathāsati | nātikrāmanti te'pyenaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ kṛtā iva ||
analyzed: yadi tu vyoma kāla ādyāḥ santaḥ syuḥ te tathā asati na atikrāmanti te api enam kṣaṇa bhaṅgam kṛtāḥ iva

original: tathāhi santo ye nāma te sarve kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ | tadyathāsaṃskṛtā bhāvāstathāsiddhā anantaram || santaścāmī tvayeṣyante vyomakāleśvarādayaḥ | kṣaṇikatvaviyoge tu na satteṣāṃ prasajyate || krameṇa yugapaccāpi yasmādarthakriyākṛtaḥ | na bhavanti sthirā bhāvā niḥsatvāste tato matāḥ ||
analyzed: tathā hi santaḥ ye nāma te sarve kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ tat yathā asaṃskṛtāḥ bhāvāḥ tathā asiddhāḥ anantaram santaḥ ca amī tvayā iṣyante vyoma kāla īśvara ādayaḥ kṣaṇikatva viyoge tu na sat teṣām prasajyate krameṇa yugapad ca api yasmāt arthakriyā kṛtaḥ na bhavanti sthirāḥ bhāvāḥ niḥsatvāḥ te tatas matāḥ

original: kāryāṇi hi vilambante kāraṇāsannidhānataḥ | samarthahetusadbhāve kṣepasteṣāṃ hi kiṅkṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: kāryāṇi hi vilambante kāraṇa asannidhānataḥ samartha hetu sadbhāve kṣepaḥ teṣām hi kiṅkṛtaḥ

original: athāpi santi nityasya kramiṇaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ | yānapekṣya karotyeṣa kāryagrāmaṃ kramāśrayam ||
analyzed: atha api santi nityasya kramiṇaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ yān apekṣya karoti eṣa kārya grāmam krama āśrayam

original: sādhvetatkiṃtu te tasya bhavanti sahakāriṇaḥ | kiṃ yogyarūpahetutvādekārthakaraṇena vā || yogyarūpasya hetutve sa bhāvastaiḥ kṛto bhavet | sa cāśakyakriyo yasmāttatsvarūpaṃ tadā sthitam || kṛtau vā tatsvarūpasya nityatā'syāvahīyate | vibhinno'tiśayastasmādyadyasau kārakaḥ katham ||
analyzed: sādhu etat kiṃtu te tasya bhavanti sahakāriṇaḥ kim yogya rūpa hetu tvāt ekārtha karaṇena vā yogya rūpasya hetu tve sa bhāvaḥ taiḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet sa ca aśakya kriyaḥ yasmāt tad sva rūpam tadā sthitam kṛtau vā tad sva rūpasya nitya tā asya avahīyate  vibhinna utiśayaḥ tasmāt yadi asau kārakaḥ katham

original: tasminsati hi kāryāṇāmutpādastadabhāvataḥ | anutpādātsa evaivaṃ hetutvena vyavasthitaḥ ||
analyzed: tasmin sati hi kāryāṇām utpādaḥ tad abhāvataḥ anutpādāt saḥ eva evam hetu tvena vyavasthitaḥ

original: athāpi tena sambandhāttasyāpyastyeva hetutā | kaḥ sambandhastayoriṣṭastādātmayaṃ na vibhedataḥ || na ca tasya tadutpattiryaugapadyaprasaṅgataḥ | tataśca yaugapadyena kāryāṇāmudayo bhavet ||
analyzed: athā api tena sambandhāt tasya api asti eva hetu tā  kaḥ sambandhaḥ tayoḥ iṣṭaḥ tādātmayam na vibhedataḥ na ca tasya tad utpattiḥ yaugapadya prasaṅgataḥ tatas ca yaugapadyena kāryāṇām udayaḥ bhavet

original: tatrāpyanyavyapekṣāyāmanavasthā prasajyate | ekadāpi tataḥ kāryaṃ nāsambandhātprakalpyate ||
analyzed: tatra api anya vyapekṣāyām anavasthā prasajyate ekadā api tatas kāryam na asambandhāt prakalpyate

original: sambandhaḥ samavāyaścettatrāpyevaṃ vicintyate | upakārībhavaṃstasya samavāyīṣyate sa kim || na vā tatheti prathamo vikalpo yadi gṛhyate | saiva prāptā tadutpattirvyapāstā sā'pyanantaram ||
analyzed: sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ ced tatra api evam vicintyate upakārībhavan tasya samavāyī iṣyate sa kim na vā tathā iti prathamaḥ vikalpaḥ yadi gṛhyate sā eva prāptā tad utpattiḥ vyapāstā sā api anantaram

original: anye'pi sarvabhāvāḥ syustathaiva samavāyinaḥ | aviśeṣānna tasyāyamupakārī mato yadi ||
analyzed: anye api sarva bhāvāḥ syuḥ tathā eva samavāyinaḥ aviśeṣāt na tasya ayam upakārī mataḥ yadi

original: bhedābhedavikalpasya pratyekaṃ pratiṣedhanāt | dvirūpo'tiśayastasya vyasto bhavati vastunaḥ ||
analyzed: bheda abheda vikalpasya pratyekam pratiṣedhanāt

original: pudgalādiparīkṣāsu dvairāśyapratiṣedhanāt | dvirūpo'tiśayo nāsti na vā'pyanubhayātmakaḥ ||
analyzed: pudgala ādi parīkṣāsu dvairāśya pratiṣedhanāt na asti na vā api anubhaya ātmakaḥ

original: atha nāpekṣate nityaḥ pratyayānsahakāriṇaḥ | tathā'pi tadviyukto'yaṃ kārako nāntyahetuvat || nijastasya svabhāvo'yaṃ teṣāmeva hi sannidhau | kārakatvamataḥ kāryaṃ tadbhāve'pi na sarvadā ||
analyzed: atha nā apekṣate nityaḥ pratyayān sahakāriṇaḥ tathā api tad viyuktaḥ yam kārakaḥ na antya hetu vat  nijaḥ tasya svabhāvaḥ yam teṣām eva hi sannidhau kāraka tvam atas kāryam tad bhāve pi na sarvadā

original: astvevaṃ kintu sākalye yā tasya prakṛtirmatā | vaikalye saiva cediṣṭā nityāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ ||
analyzed: astu evam kintu sākalye yā tasya prakṛtiḥ matā vaikalye sā eva ced iṣṭāḥ nityāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ

original: tatsambaddhasvabhāvasya bhāve teṣāmapi sthiteḥ | anyaccedvikalaṃ rūpamekatvamavahīyate || vyapekṣayā'pyataścaivaṃ na kāryāṇāṃ kramodayaḥ | yaugapadyaṃ ca naiveṣṭaṃ tatkāryāṇāṃ kramekṣaṇāt ||
analyzed: tad sambaddha svabhāvasya bhāve teṣām api sthiteḥ anyat ced vikalam rūpam eka tvam avahīyate vyapekṣayā api atas ca evam na kāryāṇām krama udayaḥ yaugapadyam ca nā evā iṣṭam tad kāryāṇām krama īkṣaṇāt

original: niḥśeṣāṇi ca kāryāṇi sakṛtkṛtvā nivarttate | sāmarthyātmā sa cedārthaḥ siddhā'sya kṣaṇabhaṅgitā ||
analyzed: niḥśeṣāṇi ca kāryāṇi sakṛt kṛtvā nivarttate sāmarthya ātmā sa ced ārthaḥ siddhā asya kṣaṇabhaṅgi tā

original: tadrūpasyānuvṛttau tu kāryamutpādayetpunaḥ | akiñcitkararūpasya sāmarthyaṃ ceṣyate katham || sarvasāmarthyaśūnyatvāttārāpathasarojavat | asanto'kṣaṇikāḥ sarve śaktiryadvastulakṣaṇam ||
analyzed: tad rūpasya anuvṛttau tu kāryam utpādayet punar akiñcitkara rūpasya sāmarthyam ca iṣyate katham sarva sāmarthya śūnya tvāt tārāpatha saroja vat  asantaḥ ukṣaṇikāḥ sarve śaktiḥ yat vastu lakṣaṇam

original: atha nāṅagīkriyetedaṃ vastutvaṃ śaktilakṣaṇam | yedavamanyannirdiśyaṃ vastūnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paraiḥ ||
analyzed: atha nā aṅagīkriyeta idam vastu tvam śakti lakṣaṇam

original: sattāsambandha iṣṭaścedvastūnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na tat | asiddheḥ samavāyādeḥ kathaṃ vā'nyo'nyalakṣaṇam ||
analyzed: sattā sambandhaḥ iṣṭaḥ ced vastūnām lakṣaṇam na tat asiddheḥ samavāya ādeḥ katham vā anyonya lakṣaṇam

original: sarvaścārthavicārādivyāpāro'rthakriyārthinaḥ | nirākuladhiyo yukto nonmattakatayā punaḥ || tanna yannāma keṣāñcitkathañcidupayujyate | kvacitkadācittatraiva yuktā sattāvyavasthitiḥ || tadrūpasyaiva cārthasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate | vyāptiḥ sarvopasaṃhārā tasminnevābhidhīyate ||

original: niḥśeṣaśaktiśūnyaṃ tu yadvandhyāsutasannibham | sarvajñacetaso'pyeti hetutvaṃ na kadācana || kriyate tatra naivedaṃ kāryarūpādyadṛṣṭitaḥ | nirnibandhanamastitvavyavasthānaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ || na tasminsādhitenārthaḥ kṣaṇikatvena kaścana | tatra paryanuyogaśca kriyamāṇo'pi niṣphalaḥ ||

original: kṣaṇikeṣvapi bhāveṣu nanu cārthakriyā katham | viśeṣādhāyino'nyonyaṃ na hyādyāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ || jātau sarvātmanā siddherajātauvastvabhāvataḥ | nirviśeṣādviśeṣasya bhāve kāryaṃ na kiṃ bhavet || nacānyato viśiṣṭāste tulyaparyanuyogataḥ | sahakārikalāpānāmanavasthā ca te bhaveta || krameṇa yugapaccāpi yataste'rthakriyākṛtaḥ | na bhavanti tatasteṣāṃ vyarthaḥ kṣaṇikatāśrayāḥ || sahakārikṛtaścaivaṃ yadā nātiśayaḥ kvacit | sarvadā nirviśeṣaiva tadā santatiriṣyate || vināśe yadyahetuḥ syādādāveva bhavedayam | sambhavo yadi nāsyādāvante'pi sa kathaṃ bhavet || svahetoryadi bhāvānāmiṣyate'nyanna kāraṇam | vināśasya kathaṃ teṣāṃ kvacideva viruddhatā ||

original: ucyate prathamāvasthā naivānyonyopakāriṇaḥ | ekārthakriyayā tvete bhavanti sahākāriṇaḥ || anyonyānupakāre'pi nāviśiṣṭā ime yataḥ | svopādānabalodbhūtāḥ kalāpotpādakaḥ pṛthak ||

original: nanu ca pratyabhijñānaṃ sa evetyupajāyate | akṣavyāpārasadbhāve niṣprakampabādhitam || tataḥ pratyakṣabādheyaṃ durvārā sarvahetuṣu | kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasiddhyarthamupātteṣu prasajyate ||

original: pūrvaṃ saṃvihitākāragocaraṃ cedidaṃ bhavet | jāyeta pūrvamevedaṃ tādarthyātpūrvabuddhivat ||

original: idānīntanamastitvaṃ na hi pūrvadhiyā gatam | tadastyasya viśeṣaścetsmaraṇe yo na vidyate || pūrvapramitamātre hi jāyate sa iti smṛtiḥ | sa evāyamitīyaṃ tu pratyabhijñā'tirekiṇī ||

original: kṣaṇikānityatālīḍhaṃ sarvaṃ cedvastu tatkatham | karmatatphalasambandhakāryakāraṇatādayaḥ ||
analyzed: kṣaṇika anitya tā līḍham sarvam ced vastu tat katham karma tad phala sambandha kārya kāraṇatā ādayaḥ

original: nairātmyavādapakṣe tu pūrvamevāvabudhyate | madvināśātphalaṃ na syānmattonyasyāpi vā bhavet || iti naiva pravartteta prekṣāvānphalalipsayā | śubhāśubhakriyārambhe dūratastu phalaṃ sthitam ||

original: saṃkṣepo'yaṃ vinaṣṭāccetkāraṇātkāryasambhavaḥ | pradhvastasyānupākhyatvānniṣkāraṇamidaṃ bhavet || avinaṣṭācca tajjātāvanekakṣaṇasaṃbhavāt | kṣaṇikatvaṃ na bhāvānāṃ vyāhanyeta tadā katham ||
analyzed: saṃkṣepaḥ yaḥ vinaṣṭāt ced kāraṇāt kārya sambhavaḥ pradhvastasya anupākhya tvāt niṣkāraṇam idam bhavet a vinaṣṭāt ca tad jātau aneka kṣaṇa saṃbhavāt kṣaṇika tvam na bhāvānām vyāhanyeta tadā katham

original: kṣaṇasthāyī ghaṭādiścennopalabhyeta cakṣuṣā | na hi naṣṭāḥ pratīyante cirātītapadārthavat || kāryakāraṇabhāvo'pi pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ | te pūrttinaivaitisiddhiṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānupalambhanāt ||
analyzed: kṣaṇa sthāyī ghaṭa ādiḥ ced na upalabhyeta cakṣuṣā na hi naṣṭāḥ pratīyante cira atīta padārtha vat kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ te pūrttinā eva eti siddhim bhāvānām svabhāva anupalambhanāt

original: ko vā vyavasthitaḥ karttā saṃdhatte kramavadgatim | asya dṛṣṭāvidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nāsyādṛṣṭau tu lakṣyate ||
analyzed: kaḥ vā vyavasthitaḥ karttā saṃdhatte kramavat gatim asya dṛṣṭau idam dṛṣṭam na asya adṛṣṭau tu lakṣyate

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgiṣu bhāveṣu pratyabhijñā ca durghaṭā | na hyanyanaradṛṣṭo'rthaḥ pratyabhijñāyate paraiḥ ||
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅgiṣu bhāveṣu pratyabhijñā ca durghaṭā na hi anya nara dṛṣṭa ūrthaḥ pratyabhijñāyate paraiḥ

original: sādṛśyātpratyabhijñānaṃ bhinne keśādike bhavet | jñāturekasya sadbhāvāddvibhede tvanibandhanam || pratisandhānakārī ca yadyeko'rtho na vidyate | rūpe dṛṣṭe'bhilāṣādistatkathaṃ syādrasādiṣu ||
analyzed: sādṛśyāt pratyabhijñānam bhinne keśa ādike bhavet  jñātuḥ ekasya sadbhāvāt dvi bhede tu anibandhanam pratisandhāna kārī ca yadi ekaḥ arthaḥ na vidyate rūpe dṛṣṭa ibhilāṣa ādiḥ tat katham syāt rasa ādiṣu

original: rāgādinigaḍairbaddhaḥ kṣaṇo'nyo bhavavārake | abaddho mucyate cānya itīdaṃ nāvabudhyate ||
analyzed: rāga ādi nigaḍaiḥ baddhaḥ kṣaṇaḥ anyaḥ bhava vārake  abaddhaḥ mucyate ca anyaḥ iti idam na avabudhyate

original: mokṣo naiva hi baddhasya kadācidapi saṃbhavī | ekāntanāśatastena vyartho muktyarthināṃ kṣaṇaḥ ||
analyzed: mokṣaḥ nā eva hi baddhasya kadācid api saṃbhavī ekānta nāśataḥ tena vyarthaḥ mukti arthinām kṣaṇaḥ

original: mokṣamāsādayandṛṣṭo baddhaḥ sa nigaḍādibhiḥ | abaddho muktimetīti dṛṣṭāvyāhatamīdṛśam ||
analyzed: mokṣam āsādayan dṛṣṭaḥ baddhaḥ sa nigaḍa ādibhiḥ abaddhaḥ muktim eti iti dṛṣṭa avyāhatam īdṛśam

original: ekādhikaraṇāvetau bandhamokṣau tathā sthiteḥ | laukikāviva tau tena sarvaṃ cārutaraṃ sthitam ||
analyzed: eka adhikaraṇau etau bandha mokṣau tathā sthiteḥ  laukikau iva tau tena sarvam cārutaram sthitam

original: etenaiva prakāreṇa smṛtyādīnāmasambhavaḥ | ekādhikaraṇābhāvātkṣaṇakṣayiṣu vastuṣu ||
analyzed: etena eva prakāreṇa smṛti ādīnām asambhavaḥ eka adhikaraṇa abhāvāt kṣaṇa kṣayiṣu vastuṣu

original: atrābhidhīyate sarvakāryakāraṇatāsthitau | satyāmavyāhatā ete sidhyantyevaṃ nirātmasu ||
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate sarva kārya kāraṇatā sthitau satyām avyāhatāḥ ete sidhyanti evam nirātmasu

original: yathāhi niyatā śaktirbījāderaṅkurādiṣu | anvayyātmaviyoge'pi tathaivādhyātmike sthitiḥ ||
analyzed: yathā hi niyatā śaktiḥ bīja ādeḥ aṅkura ādiṣu anvayi ātma viyoge api tathā eva ādhyātmike sthitiḥ

original: pāramparyeṇa sākṣādvā kacitkiñciddhi śaktimat | tataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ sambandha upapadyate ||
analyzed: pāramparyeṇa sākṣāt vā kacit kiñcid hi śaktimat tatas karma phala ādīnām sambandhaḥ upapadyate

original: kartṛtvādivyavasthā tu santānaikyavivakṣayā | kalpanāropitaiveṣṭā nāṅgaṃ sā tattvasaṃsthiteḥ ||
analyzed: kartṛ tva ādi vyavasthā tu santāna aikya vivakṣayā kalpanā āropitā evā iṣṭā na aṅgam sā tattva saṃsthiteḥ

original: anvayāsaṃbhave saiva kāryakāraṇatā bhavet | viśiṣṭā yujyate yadvatsantānāntarabhāvibhiḥ || nanu bījāṅkurādīnāṃ kāryakāraṇatekṣyate | niyatā tatra sūkṣmo'pi nāṃśo'styanugamātmakaḥ ||
analyzed: anvaya asaṃbhave sā eva kārya kāraṇatā bhavet viśiṣṭā yujyate yadvat santāna antara bhāvibhiḥ nanu bīja aṅkura ādīnām kārya kāraṇatā īkṣyate niyatā tatra sūkṣmaḥ upi na aṃśaḥ asti anugama ātmakaḥ

original: kṣityādīnāmavaiśiṣṭye bījāṅkuralatādiṣu | na bhedo yukta aikātmyāttadā siddhā niranvayā || tasmātkarmaphalādīnāṃ bhāvābhāvaprasiddhaye | kāryakāraṇatāsiddhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parairalam ||
analyzed: kṣiti ādīnām avaiśiṣṭye bīja aṅkura latā ādiṣu na bhedaḥ yuktaḥ aikātmyāt tadā siddhā niranvayā  tasmāt karma phala ādīnām bhāva abhāva prasiddhaye kārya kāraṇatā siddhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ paraiḥ alam

original: atrocyate dvitīye hi kṣaṇe kāryaṃ prajāyate | prathame kāraṇaṃ jātamavinaṣṭaṃ tadā ca tat || kṣaṇikatvāttu tatkāryakṣaṇakāle na varttate | vṛttau vā viphalaṃ kāryaṃ nirvṛttaṃ tadyatastadā ||
analyzed: atrā ucyate dvitīye hi kṣaṇe kāryam prajāyate prathame kāraṇam jātam avinaṣṭam tadā ca tat kṣaṇika tvāt tu tad kārya kṣaṇa kāle na varttate  vṛttau vā viphalam kāryam nirvṛttam tat yatas tadā

original: na ca jātaṃ purastena śakyaṃ janayituṃ punaḥ | abhūtabhāvarūpatvājjanmano nānyathā sthitiḥ ||
analyzed: na ca jātam puras tena śakyam janayitum punar abhūta bhāva rūpa tvāt janmanaḥ nā anyathā sthitiḥ

original: tasmādanaṣṭāttaddhetoḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvinaḥ | kāryamutpadyate śaktāddvitīyakṣaṇa eva tu || vinaṣṭāttu bhavetkāryaṃ tṛtīyādikṣaṇe yadi | vipākahetoḥ pradhvastādyathā kāryaṃ ca vakṣyate || yaugapadyaprasaṅgo'pi prathame yadi tadbhavet | sahabhūhetuvattacca na yuktyā yujyate punaḥ ||
analyzed: tasmāt anaṣṭāt tad hetoḥ prathama kṣaṇa bhāvinaḥ kāryam utpadyate śaktāt dvitīya kṣaṇe eva tu vinaṣṭāt tu bhavet kāryam tṛtīya ādi kṣaṇe yadi vipāka hetoḥ pradhvastāt yathā kāryam ca vakṣyate yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ upi prathame yadi tat bhavet saha bhū hetu vat tat ca na yuktyā yujyate punar

original: asataḥ prāgasāmarthyātsāmārthye kāryasaṃbhavāt | kāryakāraṇayoḥ spaṣṭaṃ yaugapadyaṃ virudhyate ||
analyzed: asataḥ prāk asāmarthyāt sāmārthye kārya saṃbhavāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ spaṣṭam yaugapadyam virudhyate

original: na hi tatkāryamātmīyaṃ saṃdaṃśeneva kāraṇam | gṛhītvā janayatyetadyaugapadyaṃ yato bhavet || nāpi gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgya prakṛtiṃ jāyate phalam | kāmīva dayitā yena sakṛdbhāvastayorbhavet ||
analyzed: na hi tat kāryam ātmīyam saṃdaṃśena iva kāraṇam  gṛhītvā janayati etat yaugapadyam yatas bhavet  nā api gāḍham samāliṅgya prakṛtim jāyate phalam kāmī iva dayitā yena sakṛt bhāvaḥ tayoḥ bhavet

original: niyamādātmahetūtthātprathamakṣaṇabhāvinaḥ | yadyato'nantaraṃ jātaṃ dvitīyapakṣaṇasannidhiḥ || tattajjanayatītyāhuravyāpāre'pi vastuni | vivakṣāmātrasaṃbhūtasaṅketānuvidhāyinaḥ ||
analyzed: niyamāt ātma hetu utthāt prathama kṣaṇa bhāvinaḥ yat yatas unantaram jātam dvitīya pakṣaṇa sannidhiḥ tat tat janayati iti āhuḥ avyāpāre api vastuni vivakṣā mātra saṃbhūta saṅketa anuvidhāyinaḥ

original: janmātiriktakālena vyāpāreṇātra kiṃ phalam | sattaiva vyāpṛtistasyāṃ satyāṃ kāryodayo yataḥ ||
analyzed: janma atirikta kālena vyāpāreṇa atra kim phalam sattā eva vyāpṛtiḥ tasyām satyām kārya udayaḥ yatas

original: ya ānantaryaniyamaḥ saivāpekṣābhidhīyate | kāryodaye sadā bhāvo vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya ca ||
analyzed: yaḥ ānantarya niyamaḥ sā eva apekṣā abhidhīyate kārya udaye sadā bhāvaḥ vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya ca

original: tadbhāvabhāvitāmātrādvyāpāropyavakalpitaḥ | hetutvameti tadvānvā tadevāstu tato varam ||
analyzed: tad bhāva bhāvi tā mātrāt vyāpāraḥ upyavakalpitaḥ hetu tvam eti tadvān vā tat eva astu tatas varam

original: bhāve sati hi dṛśyante bījādevāṅkurodayāḥ | na tu vyāpārasadbhāve bhavatkiñcitsamīkṣyate ||
analyzed: bhāve sati hi dṛśyante bījāt eva aṅkura udayāḥ na tu vyāpāra sadbhāve bhavat kiñcid samīkṣyate

original: adṛṣṭaśakterhetutve kalpyamāne'pi neṣyate | kimanyasyāpi hetutvaṃ viśeṣo vā'sya kastataḥ ||
analyzed: adṛṣṭa śakteḥ hetu tve kalpyamāne api nā iṣyate kim anyasya api hetu tvam viśeṣaḥ vā asya kaḥ tatas

original: anyena ca vinā heturyathā vyāpāra iṣyate | kāryasya vā bhavettadvatkimanye'pi na hetavaḥ ||
analyzed: anyena ca vinā hetuḥ yathā vyāpāraḥ iṣyate kāryasya vā bhavet tadvat kim anye api na hetavaḥ

original: dṛśyatvābhimataṃ naivaṃ vayaṃ copalabhāmahe | tatkathaṃ tasya sambandhamaṅgīkurmo nibandhanam ||
analyzed: dṛśya tva abhimatam nā evam vayam ca upalabhāmahe tat katham tasya sambandham aṅgīkurmaḥ nibandhanam

original: buddheryathā na janmaiva pramāṇatvaṃ nirudhyate | tathaiva sarvabhāveṣu taddhetutvaṃ na kiṃ matam ||
analyzed: buddheḥ yathā na janma eva pramāṇa tvam nirudhyate tathā eva sarva bhāveṣu tad hetu tvam na kim matam

original: kṣaṇikā hi yathā buddhistathaivānye'pi janminaḥ | sādhitāstadvadevāto nirvyāpāramidaṃ jagat ||
analyzed: kṣaṇikā hi yathā buddhiḥ tathā eva anye api janminaḥ sādhitāḥ tadvat eva atas nirvyāpāram idam jagat

original: prabandhavṛttyā gandhāderiṣṭaivānyonyahetutā | tadabādhakamevedaṃ taddhetutvaprasañjanam ||
analyzed: prabandha vṛttyā gandha ādeḥ iṣṭā eva anyonya hetutā tad abādhakam evā idam tad hetutva prasañjanam

original: anyānantarabhāve'pi kiñcideva na kāraṇam | tathaiva niyamādiṣṭaṃ tulyaṃ caitatsthireṣvapi ||
analyzed: anya anantara bhāve pi kiñcid eva na kāraṇam tathā eva niyamāt iṣṭam tulyam ca etat sthireṣu api

original: yo yatra vyāpṛtaḥ kārye na hetustasya cenmataḥ | yasminniyatasadbhāvo yaḥ sa heturitīṣyatām ||
analyzed: yaḥ yatra vyāpṛtaḥ kārye na hetuḥ tasya ced mataḥ yasmin niyata sadbhāvaḥ yaḥ sa hetuḥ iti iṣyatām

original: bhāvābhāvāvimau siddhau pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ | yadi sākāravijñānavijñeyaṃ vastu cenmatam || yadā'nākāradhīvedyaṃ vastu yuṣmābhiriṣyate | tatkṣaṇatvādipakṣe'pi samānamupalabhyate || pūrvakebhyaḥ svahetubhyo vijñānaṃ sarvameva hi | samāṃśakālarūpādi bodharūpaṃ prajāyate ||
analyzed: bhāva abhāvau imau siddhau pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ  yadi sa ākāra vijñāna vijñeyam vastu ced matam  yadā anākāra dhī vedyam vastu yuṣmābhiḥ iṣyate  tad kṣaṇa tva ādi pakṣe api samānam upalabhyate pūrvakebhyaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ vijñānam sarvam eva hi sama aṃśa kāla rūpa ādi bodha rūpam prajāyate

original: sākāre nanu vijñāne vaicitryaṃ cetaso bhavet | nākārānaṅkitatve'sti pratyāsattinibandhanam ||
analyzed: sa ākāre nanu vijñāne vaicitryam cetasaḥ bhavet pratyāsatti nibandhanam

original: bhavadbhirapi vaktavye tadasminkiñciduttare | yaccātra vaḥ samādhānamasmākamapi tadbhavet ||
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ api vaktavye tat asmin kiñcid uttare yat ca atra vaḥ samādhānam asmākam api tat bhavet

original: kṛtanāśo bhavedevaṃ kāṃrya na janayedyadi | heturiṣṭaṃ na caivaṃ yatprabandhe nāsti hetutā || akṛtābhyāgamo'pi syādyadi yena vinā kvacit | jāyeta hetunā kāṃrya naitanniyataśaktitaḥ ||
analyzed: kṛta nāśaḥ bhavet evam kāṃrya na janayet yadi hetuḥ iṣṭam na ca evam yat prabandhe nā asti hetu tā  akṛta abhyāgamaḥ upi syāt yadi yena vinā kvacid jāyeta hetunā kāṃrya na etat niyata śaktitaḥ

original: kṣaṇabhedavikalpena kṣaṇanāśādi codyate | yaccaiva naivāniṣṭaṃ tu kiñcidāpāditaṃ paraiḥ ||
analyzed: kṣaṇa bheda vikalpena kṣaṇa nāśa ādi codyate yat ca eva na eva aniṣṭam tu kiñcid āpāditam paraiḥ

original: ahīnasattvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kṣaṇabhedavikalpanā | santānaikyābhimānena na kathañcitpravarttate || abhisaṃbuddhatattvāstu pratikṣaṇavināśinām | hetūnāṃ niyamaṃ buddhvā prārabhante śubhāḥ kriyāḥ ||
analyzed: ahīna sattva dṛṣṭīnām kṣaṇa bheda vikalpanā santāna aikya abhimānena na kathañcid pravarttate abhisaṃbuddha tattvāḥ tu prati kṣaṇa vināśinām hetūnām niyamam buddhvā prārabhante śubhāḥ kriyāḥ

original: keṣāñcideva cittānāṃ viśiṣṭā kāryakāryitā | niyatā tena nirbādhāḥ sarvatra smaraṇādayaḥ ||
analyzed: keṣāñcid eva cittānām viśiṣṭā kārya kāryi tā niyatā tena nirbādhāḥ sarvatra smaraṇa ādayaḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca tatrāvidyādayo matāḥ | bandhastadvigamādiṣṭo muktirnirmalatā dhiyaḥ ||
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhūtāḥ ca tatra avidyā ādayaḥ matāḥ bandhaḥ tad vigama ādiṣṭaḥ muktiḥ nirmala tā dhiyaḥ

original: ekādhikaraṇau siddhau naivaitau laukikāvapi | bandhamokṣau prasiddhaṃ hi kṣaṇikaṃ sarvameva tat ||
analyzed: eka adhikaraṇau siddhau na eva etau laukikau api bandha mokṣau prasiddham hi kṣaṇikam sarvam eva tat

original: sarvathā'tiśayāsattvādvyāhatā tvātmanīdṛśī | kartṛbhoktṛtvabandhādivyavasthā'nityatā'nyathā ||
analyzed: sarvathā atiśaya asattvāt vyāhatā tu ātmani īdṛśī kartṛ bhoktṛ tva bandha ādi vyavasthā nitya tā anyathā

original: sarvathā'tiśayāsattvādvyāhatā tvātmanīdṛśī | kartṛbhoktṛtvabandhādivyavasthā'nityatā'nyathā ||
analyzed: sarvathā atiśaya asattvāt vyāhatā tu ātmani īdṛśī kartṛ bhoktṛ tva bandha ādi vyavasthā nitya tā anyathā

original: jātyāderniḥsvabhāvatvamayuktaṃ prākprakāśitam | dravyādayaḥ ṣaḍarthā ye vidyante pāramārthikāḥ || ityākṣapādakāṇādāḥ prāhurāgamamātrakāḥ | dravyādipratiṣedho'yaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa taducyate ||
analyzed: jāti ādeḥ niḥsvabhāva tvam ayuktam prāk prakāśitam  dravya ādayaḥ ṣaṣ arthāḥ ye vidyante pāramārthikāḥ iti ākṣapāda kāṇādāḥ prāhuḥ āgama mātrakāḥ dravya ādi pratiṣedhaḥ yam saṅkṣepeṇa tat ucyate

original: jātyāderniḥsvabhāvatvamayuktaṃ prākprakāśitam | dravyādayaḥ ṣaḍarthā ye vidyante pāramārthikāḥ || ityākṣapādakāṇādāḥ prāhurāgamamātrakāḥ | dravyādipratiṣedho'yaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa taducyate ||
analyzed: jāti ādeḥ niḥsvabhāva tvam ayuktam prāk prakāśitam  dravya ādayaḥ ṣaṣ arthāḥ ye vidyante pāramārthikāḥ iti ākṣapāda kāṇādāḥ prāhuḥ āgama mātrakāḥ dravya ādi pratiṣedhaḥ yam saṅkṣepeṇa tat ucyate

original: kṣityādibhedato bhinnaṃ navadhā dravyamiṣyate | catuḥsaṅkhyaṃ pṛthivyādi nityānityatayā dvidhā ||
analyzed: kṣiti ādi bhedataḥ bhinnam navadhā dravyam iṣyate catur saṅkhyam pṛthivī ādi nitya anitya tayā dvidhā

original: pṛthivyādyātmakāstāvadya iṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ | tenityā ye tadādyaistu prārabdhāste vināśinaḥ ||
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi ātmakāḥ tāvat ye iṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tad nityāḥ ye tad ādyaiḥ tu prārabdhāḥ te vināśinaḥ

original: tatra nityāṇurūpāṇāmasattvamupapāditam | niḥśeṣavastuviṣayakṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt ||
analyzed: tatra nitya aṇu rūpāṇām asattvam upapāditam niḥśeṣa vastu viṣaya kṣaṇa bhaṅga prasādhanāt

original: nityatve sakalāḥ sthūlā jāyeransakṛdeva hi | saṃyogādi na cāpekṣyaṃ teṣāmastyaviśeṣataḥ ||
analyzed: nitya tve sakalāḥ sthūlāḥ jāyeran sakṛt eva hi saṃyoga ādi na ca apekṣyam teṣām asti aviśeṣataḥ

original: saddharmopagataṃ nocedaṇūtpādakamiṣyate | vidyamānopalambhārthapramāṇāviṣayatvataḥ ||
analyzed: saddharma upagatam no ced aṇu utpādakam iṣyate vidyamāna upalambha artha pramāṇa aviṣaya tvataḥ

original: nāsiddherdṛśyate yena kuvindādyaṇukāraṇam | paramāṇvātmakā eva yena sarve paṭādayaḥ ||
analyzed: na asiddheḥ dṛśyate yena kuvinda ādi aṇu kāraṇam paramāṇu ātmakāḥ eva yena sarve paṭa ādayaḥ

original: sadgrāhakapramābhāvānna vā sattā prasidhyati | pramāṇavinivṛttau hi nārthābhāve'sti niścayaḥ ||
analyzed: sat grāhaka pramā abhāvāt na vā sattā prasidhyati pramāṇa vinivṛttau hi niścayaḥ

original: tadārabdhastvavayavī guṇāvayavabhedavān | naivopalabhyate tena na sidhyatyapramāṇakaḥ ||
analyzed: tad ārabdhaḥ tu avayavī guṇa avayava bhedavān na eva upalabhyate tena na sidhyati apramāṇakaḥ

original: nanūpadhānasaṃparke dṛśyate sphaṭikopalaḥ | tadrūpāgrahaṇepyevaṃ balākādiśca dṛśyate || kañcukāntarite puṃsi tadrūpādyagatāvapi | puruṣapratyayo dṛṣṭo rakte vāsasi vastradhīḥ ||
analyzed: nanu upadhāna saṃparke dṛśyate sphaṭika upalaḥ tad rūpa agrahaṇe api evam balākā ādiḥ ca dṛśyate kañcuka antarite puṃsi tad rūpa ādi agatau api puruṣa pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ rakte vāsasi vastra dhīḥ

original: rūpādīndīvarādibhya ekāntena vibhidyate | tena tasya vyavacchedāccaitrādeśca turaṅgamaḥ || kṣityādirūpagandhāderatyantaṃ vā vibhidyate | ekānekavacobhedāccandranakṣatrabhedavat ||
analyzed: rūpa ādi indīvara ādibhyaḥ ekāntena vibhidyate tena tasya vyavacchedāt caitra ādeḥ ca turaṅgamaḥ kṣiti ādi rūpa gandha ādeḥ atyantam vā vibhidyate eka aneka vacaḥ bhedāt candra nakṣatra bheda vat

original: vibhinnakartṛśaktyāderbhinnau tantupaṭau tathā | viruddhadharmayogena stambhakumbhādibhedavat ||
analyzed: vibhinna kartṛ śakti ādeḥ bhinnau tantu paṭau tathā viruddha dharma yogena stambha kumbha ādi bheda vat

original: sthūlārthāsaṃbhave tu syānnaiva vṛkṣādidarśanam | atīndriyatayā'ṇūnāṃ nacāṇuvacanaṃ bhavet || sthūlavastuvyapekṣo hi susūkṣmo'rthastathocyate | sthūlaikavastvabhāve tu kimapekṣāsya sūkṣmatā ||
analyzed: sthūla artha asaṃbhave tu syāt nā eva vṛkṣa ādi darśanam atīndriya tayā aṇūnām na ca aṇu vacanam bhavet sthūla vastu vyapekṣaḥ hi su sūkṣmaḥ ūrthaḥ tathā ucyate sthūla eka vastu abhāve tu kim apekṣā asya sūkṣmatā

original: nanu raktādirūpeṇa gṛhyante sphaṭikādayaḥ | naca tadrūpatā teṣāṃ svapakṣakṣayasaṅgateḥ ||
analyzed: nanu rakta ādi rūpeṇa gṛhyante sphaṭika ādayaḥ na ca tad rūpa tā teṣām sva pakṣa kṣaya saṅgateḥ

original: tadrūpavyatiriktaśca nāparātmopalabhyate | nacānyākāradhīvedyā yuktāste'tiprasaṅgataḥ ||
analyzed: tad rūpa vyatiriktaḥ ca na aparātmā upalabhyate na ca anya ākāra dhī vedyāḥ yuktāḥ te iti prasaṅgataḥ

original: śuklādayastathā vedyā ityevaṃ cāpi saṃbhavet | tasmādbhrāntamidaṃ jñānaṃ kambupītādibuddhivat ||
analyzed: śukla ādayaḥ tathā vedyāḥ iti evam ca api saṃbhavet tasmāt bhrāntam idam jñānam kambu pīta ādi buddhi vat

original: kañcukāntargate puṃsi na jñānaṃ tvānumānikam | taddhetusanniveśasya kañcukasyopalambhanāt ||
analyzed: kañcuka antargate puṃsi na jñānam tu ānumānikam tad hetu sanniveśasya kañcukasya upalambhanāt

original: kaṣāyakuṅkumādibhyo vastre rūpāntarodrayaḥ | pūrvarūpavināśe hi vāsasaḥ kṣaṇikatvataḥ ||
analyzed: kaṣāya kuṅkuma ādibhyaḥ vastre rūpa antara udrayaḥ pūrva rūpa vināśe hi vāsasaḥ kṣaṇika tvataḥ

original: punarjalādisāpekṣāttasmādevopajāyate | rūpādrūpāntaraṃ śuklaṃ lohādeḥ śyāmatādivat ||
analyzed: punar jala ādi sāpekṣāt tasmāt evā upajāyate rūpāt rūpa antaram śuklam loha ādeḥ śyāma tā ādi vat

original: tādavasthye tu rūpasya nānyenābhibhavo bhavet | prāktanānabhibhūtasya svarūpasyānuvarttanāt ||
analyzed: tādavasthye tu rūpasya na anyena abhibhavaḥ bhavet prāktana anabhibhūtasya sva rūpasya anuvarttanāt

original: ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādi vivakṣāmātrasaṃbhavi | tato na yuktā vastūnāṃ tatsvarūpavyavasthitiḥ ||
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda ādi vivakṣā mātra saṃbhavi tatas na yuktā vastūnām tad svarūpa vyavasthitiḥ

original: tathāhi bhinnaṃ naivānyaiḥ ṣaṇṇāmastitvamiṣyate | teṣāṃ vargaśca naivaikaḥ kaścidartho'bhyupeyate ||
analyzed: tathā hi bhinnam na eva anyaiḥ ṣaṇṇām astitvam iṣyate teṣām vargaḥ ca nā eva ekaḥ kaścid arthaḥ abhyupeyate

original: saṃjñāpakapramāṇasya viṣaye tattvamiṣyate | ṣaṇṇāmastitvamiti cetṣaḍbhyo'nyaste prasajyate ||
analyzed: saṃjñāpaka pramāṇasya viṣaye tattvam iṣyate ṣaṇṇām astitvam iti ced ṣaḍbhyaḥ nyaḥ te prasajyate

original: ṣaḍete dharmiṇaḥ proktā dharmāstebhyo'tirekiṇaḥ | iṣṭā eveti cetko'yaṃ saṃbandhastasya tairmataḥ || dravyeṣu niyamādyuktā na saṃyogo na cāparaḥ | samavāyosti nānyaśca saṃbandho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ paraiḥ ||
analyzed: ṣaṭ ete dharmiṇaḥ proktāḥ dharmāḥ tebhyaḥ atirekiṇaḥ iṣṭāḥ eva iti ced kaḥ yam saṃbandhaḥ tasya taiḥ mataḥ dravyeṣu niyama ādi uktāḥ na saṃyogaḥ na ca aparaḥ samavāyaḥ usti na anyaḥ ca saṃbandha uṅgīkṛtaḥ paraiḥ

original: saṃbandhānupapattau ca teṣāṃ dharmo bhavetkatham | tadutpādanamātrāccedanye'pi syustathāvidhāḥ ||
analyzed: saṃbandha anupapattau ca teṣām dharmaḥ bhavet katham tad utpādana mātrāt ced anye api syuḥ tathāvidhāḥ

original: tasyāpyastitvamityevaṃ vartate vyatirekiṇī | vibhaktistasya cānyasya bhāve'niṣṭhā prasajyate ||
analyzed: tasya api astitvam iti evam vartate vyatirekiṇī vibhaktiḥ tasya ca anyasya bhāveniṣṭhā prasajyate

original: anyadharmasamāveśe prāptā tatra ca dharmitā | dravyāderapi dharmitvamasmādeva ca saṃmatam ||
analyzed: anya dharma samāveśe prāptā tatra ca dharmi tā dravya ādeḥ api dharmi tvam asmāt eva ca saṃmatam

original: prathamebhyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭasya yadi sādhyate | bhedaḥ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ durnivāraṃ tadā bhavet || prāptāvasthāviśeṣā hi ye jātāstantavo'pare | viśiṣṭārthakriyāsaktāḥ prathamebhyo'vilakṣaṇāḥ ||
analyzed: prathamebhyaḥ ca tantubhyaḥ paṭasya yadi sādhyate bhedaḥ sādhana vaiphalyam durnivāram tadā bhavet prāpta avasthā viśeṣāḥ hi ye jātāḥ tantava upare viśiṣṭa artha kriyā āsaktāḥ prathamebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ

original: ekakāryopayogitvajñāpanāya pṛthakśrutau | gauravāśaktivaiphalyadoṣatyāgābhivāñchayā || sākalyenābhidhānena vyavahārasya lāghavam | manyamānaiḥ kṛtā yeṣu vāgekā vyavahartṛbhiḥ || tebhyaḥ samānakālastu paṭo naiva prasiddhyati | vibhinnakartṛsāmarthyaparimāṇādidharmavān ||
analyzed: eka kārya upayogi tva jñāpanāya pṛthak śrutau gaurava aśakti vaiphalya doṣa tyāga abhivāñchayā sākalyena abhidhānena vyavahārasya lāghavam manyamānaiḥ kṛtā yeṣu vāc ekā vyavahartṛbhiḥ tebhyaḥ samāna kālaḥ tu paṭaḥ nā eva prasiddhi ati vibhinna kartṛ sāmarthya parimāṇa ādi dharmavān

original: anyonyābhisarāścaivaṃ ye jātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ | naivātīndriyatā teṣāmanyānāṃ gocaratvataḥ ||
analyzed: anyonya abhisarāḥ ca evam ye jātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ na eva atīndriya tā teṣām anyānām gocara tvataḥ

original: nīlādiḥ paramāṇūnāmākāraḥ kalpito nijaḥ | nīlādipratibhāsā ca vedyate cakṣurādidhīḥ ||
analyzed: nīla ādiḥ paramāṇūnām ākāraḥ kalpitaḥ nijaḥ nīla ādi pratibhāsā ca vedyate cakṣuḥ ādi dhīḥ

original: paurvāparyavivekena yadyapyeṣāmalakṣaṇam | tathā'pyadhyakṣatā'bādhā pānakādāviva sthitā ||
analyzed: paurvāparya vivekena yadi api eṣām alakṣaṇam tathā api adhyakṣa tā bādhā pānaka ādau iva sthitā

original: sarveṣāmeva vastūnāṃ sarvavyāvṛttirūpiṇām | dṛṣṭāvapi tathaiveti na sarvākāraniścayaḥ ||
analyzed: sarveṣām eva vastūnām sarva vyāvṛtti rūpiṇām dṛṣṭau api tathā evā iti na sarva ākāra niścayaḥ

original: akalpanākṣagamye'pi niraṃśe'rthasya lakṣaṇe | yadbhedavyavasāye'sti kāraṇaṃ sa pratīyate ||
analyzed: akalpanā akṣa gamye api niraṃśā aṃśasya lakṣaṇe kāraṇam sa pratīyate

original: samānajvālāsaṃbhūteryathā dīpena vibhramaḥ | nairantaryasthitānekasūkṣmavittau tathaikadhā ||
analyzed: samāna jvālā saṃbhūteḥ yathā dīpena vibhramaḥ nairantarya sthita aneka sūkṣma vittau tathā ekadhā

original: vivekālakṣaṇātteṣāṃ no cetpratyakṣateṣyate | dīpādau sā kathaṃ dṛṣṭā kiṃ veṣṭo'vayavī tathā ||
analyzed: viveka alakṣaṇāt teṣām no ced pratyakṣa tā iṣyate dīpa ādau sā katham dṛṣṭā kim veṣṭa uvayavī tathā

original: etāvattu bhavedatra kathameṣāṃ na niścaye | nīlādiparamāṇūnāmākāra iti gamyate || tadapyakāraṇaṃ yasmānnaiva jñānamagocaram | nacaikasthūlaviṣayaṃ sthaulyaikatvavirodhataḥ ||
analyzed: etāvat tu bhavet atra katham eṣām na niścaye nīla ādi paramāṇūnām ākāraḥ iti gamyate tat api akāraṇam yasmāt na eva jñānam agocaram na ca eka sthūla viṣayam sthaulya eka tva virodhataḥ

original: sthūlasyaikasvabhāvatve makṣikāpadamātrataḥ | pidhāne pihitaṃ sarvamāsajyetāvibhāgataḥ || rakte ca bhāga ekasminsarvaṃ rajyeta raktavat | viruddhadharmabhāve vā nānātvamanuṣajyate ||
analyzed: sthūlasya eka svabhāva tve makṣikā pada mātrataḥ pidhāne pihitam sarvam āsajyeta avibhāgataḥ  rakte ca bhāge ekasmin sarvam rajyeta rakta vat  viruddha dharma bhāve vā nānātvam anuṣajyate

original: nanu caikasvabhāvatvātsarvaśabdo'tra kiṃkṛtaḥ | sa hyanekārthaviṣayo nānātmāvayavī na ca ||
analyzed: nanu ca eka svabhāva tvāt sarva śabdaḥ utra kim kṛtaḥ sa hi aneka artha viṣayaḥ nānā ātmā avayavī na ca

original: nanu ye lokataḥ siddhā vāsodehanagādayaḥ | ta evāvayavitvena bhavadbhirupavarṇitāḥ || raktaṃ vāso'khilaṃ sarvaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ nikhilaṃ tathā | tatrecchāmātrasaṃbhūtamiti sarve prayuñjate || tathāvidhavivakṣāyāmasmābhirapi varṇyate | sarvaṃ syādraktamityādi nirnibandhā hi vācakāḥ ||
analyzed: nanu ye lokatas siddhāḥ vāsaḥ deha naga ādayaḥ te eva avayavi tvena bhavadbhiḥ upavarṇitāḥ raktam vāsaḥ khilam sarvam niḥśeṣam nikhilam tathā tatra icchā mātra saṃbhūtam iti sarve prayuñjate tathāvidha vivakṣāyām asmābhiḥ api varṇyate sarvam syāt raktam ityādi nirnibandhāḥ hi vācakāḥ

original: bhāktaṃ tadabhidhānaṃ cedvacobhedaḥ prasajyate | naca buddhervibhedo'sti gauṇamukhyatayeṣṭayoḥ ||
analyzed: bhāktam tad abhidhānam ced vacaḥ bhedaḥ prasajyate na ca buddheḥ vibhedaḥ usti gauṇa mukhya tayā iṣṭayoḥ

original: nanu cāvyāpyavṛttitvātsaṃyogasya na raktatā | sarvasyāsajyate nāpi sarvamāvṛtamīkṣyate ||
analyzed: nanu ca avyāpya vṛtti tvāt saṃyogasya na rakta tā sarvasya āsajyate nā api sarvam āvṛtam īkṣyate

original: nanu cānaṃśake dravye kimavyāptaṃ vyavasthitam | svarūpaṃ tadavasthāne bhedaḥ siddho'taeva vā || bahudeśasthitistena naivaikasminkṛtāspadā | tataḥ siddhā paṭādīnāmaṇubhyo'nekarūpatā ||
analyzed: nanu ca an aṃśake dravye kim avyāptam vyavasthitam sva rūpam tad avasthāne bhedaḥ vā  bahu deśa sthitiḥ tena na eva ekasmin kṛta āspadā tatas siddhā paṭa ādīnām aṇubhyaḥ neka rūpa tā

original: avijñātārthatattvastu piṇḍamekaṃ ca manyate | lokastatkalpitāpekṣaḥ paramāṇurihocyate ||
analyzed: avijñāta artha tattvaḥ tu piṇḍam ekam ca manyate lokaḥ tad kalpita apekṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ iha ucyate

original: nimittanirapekṣā vā saṃjñeyaṃ tādṛśi sthitā | saṅketānvayinī yadvannirvitte'pīśvaraśrutiḥ ||
analyzed: nimitta nirapekṣā vā saṃjñā iyam tādṛśi sthitā saṅketa anvayinī yadvat nirvittā ipi īśvara śrutiḥ

original: ekāvayavyanugatā naiva tantukarādayaḥ | anekatvādyathāsiddhāḥ kaṭakuṭyakuṭādayaḥ || yadi vābhimataṃ dravyaṃ nānekāvayavāśritam | ekatvādaṇuvadvṛtterayuktirbādhikā pramā ||
analyzed: eka avayavi anugatāḥ nā eva tantu kara ādayaḥ aneka tvāt yathā asiddhāḥ kaṭa kuṭyakuṭa ādayaḥ yadi vā abhimatam dravyam na aneka avayava āśritam eka tvāt aṇu vat vṛtteḥ ayuktiḥ bādhikā pramā

original: taddhyekavṛttibhājaiva rūpeṇāvayavāntare | vartteta yadi vā'nyena na prakārāntaraṃ yataḥ || tatra tenaiva nānyatra vṛttirasyāvakalpate | tena kroḍīkṛtatvena nānyathā tatra vṛttimat ||
analyzed: tat hi eka vṛtti bhājā eva rūpeṇa avayava antare vartteta yadi vā anyena na prakāra antaram yatas tatra tena eva na anyatra vṛttiḥ asya avakalpate tena kroḍīkṛta tvena na anyathā tatra vṛttimat

original: naiva dhātryantarakroḍamadhyāste hi yathā śiśuḥ | ekakroḍīkṛtaṃ dravyaṃ nāśrayeta tathā'param ||
analyzed: nā eva dhātrī antara kroḍam adhyāste hi yathā śiśuḥ eka kroḍīkṛtam dravyam nā āśrayeta tathā aparam

original: tatsaṃbaddhasvabhāvasya hyataddeśe'pi vṛttitaḥ | prāptaṃ tadekadeśatvamaikātmyaṃ cāvibhāgataḥ || anyenaivātmanā vṛttau naiko'nekavyavasthitaḥ | siddhyetsvabhāvabhedasya vastubhedātmakatvataḥ ||
analyzed: tad saṃbaddha svabhāvasya hi a tad deśe api vṛttitaḥ prāptam tad eka deśa tvam aikātmyam ca avibhāgataḥ anyena eva ātmanā vṛttau na ekaḥ aneka vyavasthitaḥ siddhyet svabhāva bhedasya vastu bheda ātmaka tvataḥ

original: samavāyātmikā vṛttistasya teṣviti cennanu | tasyāmapi vicāro'yaṃ kopenaiva pradhāvati ||
analyzed: samavāya ātmikā vṛttiḥ tasya teṣu iti ced nanu tasyām api vicāraḥ yam kopena eva pradhāvati

original: yadvā sarvātmanā vṛttāvanekatvaṃ prasajyate | ekadeśena cāniṣṭā naiko vā na kvacicca saḥ ||
analyzed: yat vā sarva ātmanā vṛttau aneka tvam prasajyate eka deśena ca aniṣṭāḥ na ekaḥ vā na kvacid ca saḥ

original: svātantryeṇa prasaṅgena sādhanaṃ yatpravarttate | svayaṃ tadupalabdhau hi satyaṃ saṅgacchate na tu || naca kārtsnyaikadeśābhyāṃ vṛttiḥ kvacana lakṣitā | yasyā asaṃbhavāddravyamasatsyādaparo'pi ca || dṛṣṭau vā kvacidetasyā dravyādāvanivāraṇam | atha tasminnadṛṣṭau tu bhede praśno na yujyate || etāvattu bhavedvācyaṃ vṛttirnāstīti tacca na | yuktaṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddherihedamiti buddhitaḥ || pratyakṣaṃ na tadiṣṭaṃ cedbādhakaṃ kiñciducyatām | rūpādicetaso'pi syānnaiva pratyakṣatā'nyathā ||
analyzed: svātantryeṇa prasaṅgena sādhanam yat pravarttate svayam tad upalabdhau hi satyam saṅgacchate na tu  / na ca kārtsnya eka deśābhyām vṛttiḥ kvacana lakṣitā yasyāḥ asaṃbhavāt dravyam asat syāt aparā api ca dṛṣṭau vā kvacid etasyāḥ dravya ādau anivāraṇam atha tasmin adṛṣṭau tu bhede praśnaḥ na yujyate etāvat tu bhavet vācyam vṛttiḥ na asti iti tat ca na yuktam pratyakṣataḥ siddheḥ iha idam iti buddhitaḥ pratyakṣam na tat iṣṭam ced bādhakam

original: tadatra vṛttirnāstīti prāgabhedena sādhitam | ihetyasti naca jñānaṃ tadrūpāpratibhāsanāt ||
analyzed: tat atra vṛttiḥ na asti iti prāk abhedena sādhitam iha iti asti na ca jñānam tad rūpa apratibhāsanāt

original: kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdābhyāmayaṃ cārthaḥ prakāśyate | nairaṃśyenāsya kiṃ vṛttiḥ kiṃ vā tasyānyathaiva sā || yathā pātrādisaṃsthasya śrīphalāderyathā'thavā | anekāsanasaṃsthasya caitrāderupalakṣitā ||
analyzed: kṛtsna eka deśa śabdābhyām ayam ca arthaḥ prakāśyate nairaṃśyena asya kim vṛttiḥ kim vā tasya anyathā eva sā  yathā pātra ādi saṃsthasya śrīphala ādeḥ yathā athavā aneka āsana saṃsthasya caitra ādeḥ upalakṣitā

original: samāśritāḥ kvacicchabdā vināśitvādihetutaḥ | ghaṭadīpādivattacca kila vyoma bhaviṣyati ||
analyzed: samāśritāḥ kvacid śabdāḥ vināśi tva ādi hetutaḥ ghaṭa dīpa ādi vat tat ca kila vyoma bhaviṣyati

original: ādityādikriyādravyavyatirekanibandhanam | parāparādivijñānaṃ ghaṭādipratyayo yathā || valīpalitakārkaśyagatyādipratyayādidam | yato vilakṣaṇaṃ hetuḥ sa ca kālaḥ kileṣyate ||
analyzed: āditya ādi kriyā dravya vyatireka nibandhanam para apara ādi vijñānam ghaṭa ādi pratyayaḥ yathā valī palita kārkaśya gati ādi pratyayāt idam yatas vilakṣaṇam hetuḥ sa ca kālaḥ kila iṣyate

original: pūrvāparādibuddhibhyo digevamanumīyate | krameṇa jñānajātyā ca manaso'numitirmatā || cakṣurādivibhinnaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ samapekṣate | krameṇa jātā rūpādipratipattī rathādivat ||

original: na pācakādibuddhīnāmasti kiñcinnibandhanam | karmāsti cetprativyakti nanu tadbhidyate tathā || bhinneṣvanvayino'satve na yuktā'nvayinī matiḥ | ityekamiṣṭaṃ sāmānyaṃ sarvavyaktyanuvṛttimat || karmānvayadaridraṃ ca yadi hetuḥ prakalpyate | tadā vyaktaya evāsyāḥ kimitīṣṭā na hetavaḥ || pācakādimatirna syāttatra coparatakriye | na sadāsannidhānaṃ hi karmeṣṭaṃ jātivatparaiḥ || atītānāgataṃ karma nimittīkṛtya teṣu cet | pācakādiṣu dhīśabdau tanna heturasattvataḥ ||

original: kriyātvajātisambandhakriyāyogānmatiryadi | naṣṭakriye'pi ca tayā dhruvahetūpalakṣaṇāt ||

analyzed: daṇḍa aṅgada ādi jātīnām ekadā na hi lakṣaṇe tad viyoge pi daṇḍi ādi matiḥ teṣu pravarttate atha api pācaka tva ādi jātiḥ anyā eva varttate sadyojātā ipi tad yogāt pācaka ādi matiḥ bhavet sat ādi mati vat no ced tadā sā samavāyinī paścāt api na sā tatra tathā syāt aviśeṣataḥ tad sambaddha svabhāvasya vaiguṇyāt na tayoḥ asau samavāyaḥ tathā paścāt tādātmye ca katham bhavet

original: svecchayā racite vā'sminkalpiteṣviva vastuṣu | na kāraṇaniyogo'yaṃ paraṃ pratyupapadyate ||
analyzed: sva icchayā racite vā asmin kalpiteṣu iva vastuṣu na kāraṇa niyogaḥ yam param pratyupapadyate

original: vṛkṣe śākhāḥ śilāścāga ityeṣā laukikī matiḥ | agākhyapariśiṣṭāṅganairantaryopalambhanāt || tau punastāsviti jñānaṃ lokātikrāntamucyate | ghaṭe rūpaṃ kriyādīti tādātmyaṃ tvavagacchati || rūpakumbhādiśabdā hi sarvāvasthābhidhāyakāḥ | tadviśeṣābhidhānāya tathā te viniveśitāḥ || tānāśrityaiṣu vijñānaṃ tenākāreṇa varttate | samavāyānna bhedasya sarveṣāmapyanīkṣaṇāt ||
analyzed: vṛkṣe śākhāḥ śilāḥ ca agaḥ iti eṣā laukikī matiḥ ak ākhya pariśiṣṭa aṅga nairantarya upalambhanāt  tau punar tāsu iti jñānam loka atikrāntam ucyate ghaṭe rūpam kriyā ādi iti tādātmyam tu avagacchati rūpa kumbha ādi śabdāḥ hi sarva avasthā abhidhāyakāḥ tad viśeṣa abhidhānāya tathā te viniveśitāḥ tān āśritya eṣu vijñānam tena ākāreṇa varttate  samavāyāt na bhedasya sarveṣām api anīkṣaṇāt

original: yadyekaḥ samavāyaḥ syātsarveṣveva ca vastuṣu | kapālādiṣvapi jñānaṃ paṭādīti prasajyate || gajādiṣvapi gotvādi samastītyanuṣajyate | tato gavādirūpatvamamīṣāṃ śāvaleyavat || paṭastantuṣu yo'stīti samavāyātpratīyate | asti cāsau kapāleṣu tasyeti na tatheti kim || nāśritaḥ sa kapāle cennanu tantuṣvapīṣyate | āśritaḥ samavāyena sa kapāle'pi nāsti kim || tantoryaḥ samavāyo hi paṭasyetyabhidhīyate | sa ghaṭasya kapāleṣu taddhīranavadhirbhavet ||
analyzed: yadi ekaḥ samavāyaḥ syāt sarveṣu eva ca vastubhiḥ kapāla ādiṣu api jñānam paṭa ādi iti prasajyate gaja ādiṣu api go tva ādi samasti iti anuṣajyate tatas gavādi rūpa tvam amīṣām śāvaleya vat paṭaḥ tantuṣu samavāyāt pratīyate asti ca asau kapāleṣu tasya iti na tathā iti kim na āśritaḥ sa kapāle ced nanu tantuṣu api iṣyate āśritaḥ samavāyena sa kapāle api na asti kim tantoḥ yaḥ samavāyaḥ hi paṭasya iti abhidhīyate sa ghaṭasya kapāleṣu

original: evaṃ yaśca gajatvādisamavāyo gajādiṣu | gotvādijātibhedānāṃ sa eva svāśrayeṣvapi ||
analyzed: evam yaḥ ca gaja tva ādi samavāyaḥ gaja ādiṣu go tva ādi jāti bhedānām saḥ eva sva āśrayeṣu api

original: ādhārādheyaniyamaḥ sa caikatve'pi vidyate | dravyeṣviva hi tajjātikarmasveva ca karmatā ||
analyzed: ādhāra ādheya niyamaḥ sa ca eka tve pi vidyate dravyeṣu iva hi tad jāti karmasu eva ca karma tā

original: iheti samavāyotthavijñānānvayarśanāt | sarvatra samavāyo'yameka eveti gamyate || dravyatvādinimittānāṃ vyatirekasya darśanāt | dhiyāṃ dravyādijātīnāṃ niyamastvavasīyate ||
analyzed: iha iti samavāya uttha vijñāna anvaya rśanāt sarvatra samavāyaḥ uyam ekaḥ eva iti gamyate dravya tva ādi nimittānām vyatirekasya darśanāt dhiyām dravya ādi jātīnām niyamaḥ tu avasīyate

original: tadyathā kuṇḍadadhnośca saṃyogaikye'pi dṛśyate | ādhārādheyaniyamastatheha niyamo mataḥ || vyaṅgyavyañjakasāmarthyabhedāddravyādijātiṣu | samavāyaikabhāve'pi naiva cetsa virudhyate ||
analyzed: tat yathā kuṇḍa dadhnoḥ ca saṃyoga aikye pi dṛśyate  ādhāra ādheya niyamaḥ tathā iha niyamaḥ mataḥ vyaṅgya vyañjaka sāmarthya bhedāt dravya ādi jātiṣu samavāya eka bhāve api nā eva ced sa virudhyate

original: ādhārādheyaniyamo nanvekatve'sya durghaṭaḥ | dravyatvaṃ dravya eveṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tatsamavāyataḥ || tasyāsau samavāyaśca guṇādiṣvapi vidyate | guṇajātyādisambandhādeka eva hyayaṃ tayoḥ ||
analyzed: ādhāra ādheya niyamaḥ nanu ekatva isya durghaṭaḥ dravya tvam dravye evā iṣṭam katham tad samavāyataḥ tasya asau samavāyaḥ ca guṇa ādiṣu api vidyate guṇa jāti ādi sambandhāt ekaḥ eva hi ayam tayoḥ

original: anyathā guṇajātyādibhinna eva bhavedayam | yogibhedātprativyakti yathā yogo vibhidyate ||
analyzed: anyathā guṇa jāti ādi bhinnaḥ eva bhavet ayam yogi bhedāt prativyakti yathā yogaḥ vibhidyate

original: dravyatvādinimittānāṃ vyatireko na yujyate | dhiyāṃ nimittasadbhāvādatastanniyamo'pi na ||
analyzed: dravya tva ādi nimittānām vyatirekaḥ na yujyate dhiyām nimitta sadbhāvāt atas tad niyamaḥ api na

original: tadāśritatvasthānādi tasmādevābhidhīyate | samavāyādataścaitanna yuktaṃ tanniyāmakam ||
analyzed: tad āśrita tva sthāna ādi tasmāt eva abhidhīyate samavāyāt atas ca etat na yuktam tad niyāmakam

original: vyaṅgyavyañjakasāmarthyabhedo'pi samavāyataḥ | nānyatastu sa nityānāmutpādānupapattitaḥ ||
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjaka sāmarthya bhedaḥ api samavāyataḥ na anyatas tu sa nityānām utpāda anupapattitaḥ

original: nahi dīpādisadbhāvājjāyante yādṛśā ime | vijñānajanane yogyā ghaṭādyā jātayastathā ||
analyzed: nahi dīpa ādi sadbhāvāt jāyante yādṛśāḥ ime vijñāna janane yogyāḥ ghaṭa ādyāḥ jātayaḥ tathā

original: kuṇḍadadhnośca saṃyoga ekaḥ pūrvaṃ nirākṛtaḥ | na cāsau niyatastasmādyujyatetiprasaṅgtaḥ ||
analyzed: kuṇḍa dadhnoḥ ca saṃyogaḥ ekaḥ pūrvam nirākṛtaḥ na ca asau niyataḥ tasmāt yujyate iti prasaṅgtaḥ

original: nityatvenāsya sarve'pi nityāḥ prāptāḥ ghaṭādayaḥ | ādhāreṣu sadā teṣāṃ samavāyo na saṃsthiteḥ ||
analyzed: nitya tvena asya sarve api nityāḥ prāptāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ ādhāreṣu sadā teṣām samavāyaḥ na saṃsthiteḥ

original: svārambhakavibhāgādvā yadi vā tadvināśataḥ | te naśyanti kriyādyā dīva yogāderiti cenna tat || svādhāraissamavāyo hi teṣāmapi sadā mataḥ | teṣāṃ vināśabhāve tu niyatā'syāpi nāśitā ||
analyzed: sva ārambhaka vibhāgāt vā yadi vā tad vināśataḥ te naśyanti kriyā ādyāḥ yoga ādeḥ iti ced na tat sva ādhāraiḥ samavāyaḥ hi teṣām api sadā mataḥ teṣām vināśa bhāve tu niyatā asya api nāśi tā

original: sambandhino nivṛttau hi sambandho'stīti durghaṭam | nahi saṃyuktanāśe'pi saṃyogo nopatiṣṭhate || yathā saṃyogabhāve tu saṃyuktānāmavasthitiḥ | samavāyasya sadbhāve tathā syātsamavāyinām ||
analyzed: sambandhinaḥ nivṛttau hi sambandhaḥ usti iti durghaṭam nahi saṃyukta nāśe api saṃyogaḥ nā upatiṣṭhate yathā saṃyoga bhāve tu saṃyuktānām avasthitiḥ samavāyasya sadbhāve tathā syāt samavāyinām

original: ekasambandhināśe'pi samavāyo'vatiṣṭhate | anyasambandhisadbhāvādyogo no cenna bhedataḥ ||
analyzed: eka sambandhi nāśe api samavāyaḥ uvatiṣṭhate anya sambandhi sadbhāvāt yogaḥ no ced na bhedataḥ

original: yadyevaṃ ye vinaśyanti ghaṭādyāḥ samavāyinaḥ | teṣāṃ vṛttyātmako yo'sau samavāyaḥ prakalpitaḥ || sa eva vyavatiṣṭheta kiṃ sambandhyantarasthiteḥ | athānya eva saṃyogabahutādivat || nādyastallakṣaṇasyaiva samavāyasya saṃsthitau | pūrvavatte sthitā eva prāpnuvanti ghaṭādayaḥ || na teṣāmanavasthāne teṣāṃ vṛttyātmakaḥ kvacit | samavāyo'vatiṣṭheta saṃjñāmātreṇa vā tathā || ataḥ prāgapi sadbhāvānna te vṛttāḥ syurāśraye | paścādiva tathā hyeṣā vṛttisteṣāmavastutaḥ ||
analyzed: yadi evam ye vinaśyanti ghaṭa ādyāḥ samavāyinaḥ teṣām vṛtti ātmakaḥ yaḥ asau samavāyaḥ prakalpitaḥ saḥ eva vyavatiṣṭheta kim sambandhi antara sthiteḥ atha anyaḥ eva saṃyoga bahu tā ādi vat na ādyaḥ tad lakṣaṇasya eva samavāyasya saṃsthitau pūrvavat te sthitāḥ eva prāpnuvanti ghaṭa ādayaḥ na teṣām anavasthāne teṣām vṛtti ātmakaḥ kvacid samavāyaḥ uvatiṣṭheta saṃjñā mātreṇa vā tathā atas prāk api sadbhāvāt na te vṛttā

original: athānya eva saṃyogavibhāgabahutādivat | sambandhyantarasadbhāve samavāyo'vatiṣṭhate || saṃyogādivadevaṃ hi nanvasya bahutā bhavet | evamādyasya sadbhāve bahu syādasamañjasam ||
analyzed: atha anyaḥ eva saṃyoga vibhāga bahu tā ādi vat sambandhi antara sadbhāve samavāyaḥ uvatiṣṭhate saṃyoga ādi vat evam hi nanu asya bahu tā bhavet evam ādyasya sadbhāve bahu syāt asamañjasam

original: athānya eva saṃyogavibhāgabahutādivat | sambandhyantarasadbhāve samavāyo'vatiṣṭhate || saṃyogādivadevaṃ hi nanvasya bahutā bhavet | evamādyasya sadbhāve bahu syādasamañjasam ||
analyzed: atha anyaḥ eva saṃyoga vibhāga bahu tā ādi vat sambandhi antara sadbhāve samavāyaḥ uvatiṣṭhate saṃyoga ādi vat evam hi nanu asya bahu tā bhavet evam ādyasya sadbhāve bahu syāt asamañjasam

original: yadi nopādhayaḥ kecidvidyante paramārthataḥ | daṇḍī śuklaścalatyasti gaurihetyādidhīdhvanī || syātāṃ kiṃviṣayāvetau nānimittau ca tau matau | sarvasminnavibhāgena tayorvṛttirasambhavī ||
analyzed: yadi nā upādhayaḥ kecid vidyante paramārthataḥ  daṇḍī śuklaḥ calati asti gauḥ iha iti ādi dhī dhvanī  syātām kiṃviṣayau etau na animittau ca tau matau sarvasmin avibhāgena tayoḥ vṛttiḥ asambhavī

original: yadi nopādhayaḥ kecidvidyante paramārthataḥ | daṇḍī śuklaścalatyasti gaurihetyādidhīdhvanī || syātāṃ kiṃviṣayāvetau nānimittau ca tau matau | sarvasminnavibhāgena tayorvṛttirasambhavī ||
analyzed: yadi nā upādhayaḥ kecid vidyante paramārthataḥ  daṇḍī śuklaḥ calati asti gauḥ iha iti ādi dhī dhvanī  syātām kiṃviṣayau etau na animittau ca tau matau sarvasmin avibhāgena tayoḥ vṛttiḥ asambhavī

original: ucyate viṣayo'mīṣāṃ dhīdhvanīnāṃ na kaścana | antarmātrāniviṣṭaṃ tu bījameṣāṃ nibandhanam ||
analyzed: ucyate viṣayaḥ umīṣām dhī dhvanīnām na kaścana antar mātrā niviṣṭam tu bījam eṣām nibandhanam

original: yasya yasya hi śabdasya yo yo viṣaya ucyate | sa sa saṃvidyate naiva vastūnāṃ sā hi dharmatā ||
analyzed: yasya yasya hi śabdasya yaḥ yaḥ viṣayaḥ ucyate sa sa saṃvidyate na eva vastūnām sā hi dharma tā

original: yataḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ jātistadyogo jātimāṃstathā | buddhyākāro na śabdārthe ghaṭāmañcati tattvataḥ ||
analyzed: yatas sva lakṣaṇam jātiḥ tad yogaḥ jātimān tathā buddhi ākāraḥ na śabda arthe tattvataḥ

original: tatra svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvanna śabdaiḥ pratipādyate | saṅketavyavahārāptakālavyāptiviyogataḥ ||
analyzed: tatra sva lakṣaṇam tāvat na śabdaiḥ pratipādyate saṅketa vyavahāra āpta kāla vyāpti viyogataḥ

original: vyaktyātmāno'nuyantyete na paraspararūpataḥ | deśakālakriyāśaktipratibhāsādibhedataḥ || tasmātsaṅketadṛṣṭo'rtho vyavahāre na dṛśyate | nacāgṛhītasaṅketo bodhyetānya iva dhvaneḥ ||
analyzed: vyakti ātmānaḥ nuyanti ete na paraspara rūpataḥ deśa kāla kriyā śakti pratibhāsa ādi bhedataḥ tasmāt saṅketa dṛṣṭaḥ ūrthaḥ vyavahāre na dṛśyate  na ca agṛhīta saṅketaḥ bodhyeta anyaḥ iva dhvaneḥ

original: himācalādayo ye'pi deśakālādyabhedinaḥ | dṛṣṭāsteṣvaṇavo bhinnāḥ kṣaṇikāśca prasādhitāḥ ||
analyzed: himācala ādayaḥ ye pi deśa kāla ādi abhedinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ teṣu aṇavaḥ bhinnāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ ca prasādhitāḥ

original: aśakyaṃ samayasyāsya jāte'jāte ca kalpanam | nājāte samayo yukto bhāviko'śvaviṣāṇavat || upanāpijāte gṛhītānāṃ pūrvaṃ vācāmanusmṛtau | kriyate samayastatra cirātītekathaṃ nu tat ||
analyzed: aśakyam samayasya asya jāte jāte ca kalpanam  na ajāte samayaḥ yuktaḥ bhāvi kośva viṣāṇa vat  upa nāpi jāte gṛhītānām pūrvam vācām anusmṛtau kriyate samayaḥ tatra cira atīte katham nu tat

original: yaścāpi tatsajātīyastadbalena tadāparaḥ | na tatra samayābhogaḥ sādṛśyaṃ ca vikalpitam ||
analyzed: yaḥ ca api tad sajātīyaḥ tad balena tadā aparaḥ na tatra samaya ābhogaḥ sādṛśyam ca vikalpitam

original: uṣṇādipratipattiryā nāmādidhvanibhāvinī | vispaṣṭābhāsate naiṣā tadarthendriyabuddhivat ||
analyzed: uṣṇa ādi pratipattiḥ yā nāma ādi dhvani bhāvinī vispaṣṭā ābhāsate na eṣā tad artha indriya buddhi vat

original: na sa tasya ca śabdasya yukto yogo na tatkṛte | pratyaye sati bhātyartho rūpabodhe tathā rasaḥ ||
analyzed: na sa tasya ca śabdasya yuktaḥ yogaḥ na tad kṛte pratyaye sati bhāti arthaḥ rūpa bodhe tathā rasaḥ

original: etenaiva prakāreṇa vyaktyākṛtyornirākṛtiḥ | svalakṣaṇātmataiveṣṭā tayorapi yataḥ paraiḥ ||
analyzed: etena eva prakāreṇa vyakti ākṛtyoḥ nirākṛtiḥ sva lakṣaṇa ātma tā evā iṣṭā tayoḥ api yatas paraiḥ

original: dravyādiyogayoḥ prāktu pratiṣedhābhidhānataḥ | na tātvikī tayoryuktā śabdārthatvavyavasthitiḥ ||
analyzed: dravya ādi yogayoḥ prāk tu pratiṣedha abhidhānataḥ na tātvikī tayoḥ yuktā śabda artha tva vyavasthitiḥ

original: jātisambandhayoḥ pūṃrva vyāsataḥ pratiṣedhanāt | nānantarāḥ prakalpyante śabdārthāstrividhāḥ pare ||
analyzed: jāti sambandhayoḥ vyāsataḥ pratiṣedhanāt na anantarāḥ prakalpyante śabda arthāḥ trividhāḥ pare

original: tadvyaktyākṛtijātīnāṃ padārthatvaṃ yaducyate | tadasambhavi sarvāsāmapi nīrūpatā yataḥ ||
analyzed: tad vyakti ākṛti jātīnām padārtha tvam yat ucyate tat asambhavi sarvāsām api nīrūpa tā yatas

original: buddhyākāraśca buddhistho nārthabuddhyantarānugaḥ | nābhipretārthakārī ca so'pi vācyo na tattvataḥ ||
analyzed: buddhi ākāraḥ ca buddhi sthaḥ na artha buddhi antara anugaḥ na abhipreta artha kārī ca saḥ api vācyaḥ na tattvataḥ

original: ye'nye'nyathaiva śabdārthamastyarthādīnpracakṣate | nirastā eva te'pyetaistathāpi punarucyate ||
analyzed: śabda artham asti artha ādīn pracakṣate nirastāḥ eva te pi etaiḥ tathā api punar ucyate

original: astyarthaḥ sarvaśabdānāmiti pratyāyyalakṣaṇam | apūrvadevatāsvargaiḥ samamāhurgavādiṣu ||
analyzed: asti arthaḥ sarva śabdānām iti pratyāyya lakṣaṇam apūrva devatā svargaiḥ samam āhuḥ gavādiṣu

original: samudāyo'bhidheyo vā'pyavikalpasamuccayaḥ | asatyo vā'pi saṃsargaḥ śabdārthaḥ kaiściducyate ||
analyzed: samudāyaḥ abhidheyaḥ vā api a vikalpa samuccayaḥ asatyaḥ vā api saṃsargaḥ śabda arthaḥ kaiścid ucyate

original: asatyopādhi yatsatyaṃ tadvā śabdanibandhanam | śabdo vā'pyabhijalpatvamāgato yāti vācyatām ||
analyzed: asatya upādhi yat satyam tat vā śabda nibandhanam  śabdaḥ vā api abhijalpa tvam āgataḥ yāti vācya tām

original: so'yamityabhisambandhādrūpamekīkṛtaṃ yadā | śabdasyārthena taṃ śabdamabhijalpaṃ pracakṣate ||
analyzed: saḥ ayam iti abhisambandhāt rūpam ekīkṛtam yadā śabdasya arthena tam śabdam abhijalpam pracakṣate

original: yo vā'rtho buddhiviṣayo bāhyavastunibandhanaḥ | sa bāhyaṃ vastviti jñātaḥ śabdārthaḥ kaiścidiṣyate ||
analyzed: yaḥ vā arthaḥ buddhi viṣayaḥ bāhya vastu nibandhanaḥ sa bāhyam vastu iti jñātaḥ śabda arthaḥ kaiścid iṣyate

original: abhyāsātpratibhāhetuḥ sarvaḥ śabdaḥ samāsataḥ | bālānāṃ ca tiraścāṃ ca yathā'rthapratipādane ||
analyzed: abhyāsāt pratibhā hetuḥ sarvaḥ śabdaḥ samāsatas bālānām ca tiraścām ca yathā artha pratipādane

original: tatrāstyartho'bhidheyo'yaṃ kiṃ svalakṣaṇamiṣyate | jātiryogo'tha yadvā'nyat buddhervā pratibimbakam || ete svadoṣāḥ pūrvoktā astyarthe kevale'pi ca | pratipādye na bhedena vyavahāro'vakalpate ||
analyzed: tatra asti arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ yam kim sva lakṣaṇam iṣyate jātiḥ yogaḥ utha yat vā anyat buddheḥ vā pratibimbakam ete sva doṣāḥ pūrva uktāḥ asti arthe kevale api ca pratipādye na bhedena vyavahāraḥ uvakalpate

original: gotvaśabdaviśiṣṭārthasattāmātragaterbhavet | viṣāṇākṛtinīlādibhedākhyātestu tanmatam ||
analyzed: go tva śabda viśiṣṭa artha sattā mātra gateḥ bhavet viṣāṇa ākṛti nīla ādi bheda ākhyāteḥ tu tat matam

original: nanvevaṃ tadvato'rthasya bhedānāṃ cābhidhā bhavet | tadbhāve tatra doṣaśca nānyo'styarthaśca dṛśyate ||
analyzed: nanu evam tadvataḥ ṛthasya bhedānām ca abhidhā bhavet tad bhāve tatra doṣaḥ ca na anyaḥ asti arthaḥ ca dṛśyate

original: samudāyābhidhāne'pi jātibhedābhidhā sphuṭā | tapojātikriyādīnāṃ sāmastyenābhidhānataḥ ||
